rules.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive or with a content warning
rules.hint: This includes content that is particularly provocative even if it may not show specific body parts, as well as dead bodies, bloody injuries, and other gore. Particularly obscene content may be prohibited entirely. Profile pictures and header images may not contain sexually explicit or violent media.

rules.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, xenophobia, or casteism.
rules.hint: Transphobic behavior such as intentional misgendering and deadnaming is strictly prohibited. Promotion of "conversion therapy" is strictly prohibited. Criticism of governments and religions is permissible unless being used as a proxy for discrimination.

rules.text: No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
rules.hint: Calling for people or groups to be assassinated, murdered, or attacked physically is strictly prohibited. Support for violent groups or events is prohibited.

rules.text: No harassment, block evasion, dogpiling, or doxxing of others
rules.hint: Repeat attempts to communicate with users who have blocked you or creation of accounts solely to harass or insult individuals is strictly prohibited. Coordinated activity to attack other users is prohibited. Posting of private personal information about others is prohibited.

rules.text: Do not share information widely-known to be false and misleading
rules.hint: False and misleading information and links from low-quality sources may not be posted, especially if they are likely to mislead or confuse others or endanger their safety.

rules.text: Content created by others must be attributed, and use of generative AI must be disclosed
rules.hint: Content created by others must clearly provide a reference to the author, creator, or source. For adult content, this should include performers. Accounts may not solely post AI-generated content.

rules.text: No discrimination, including (but not limited to) racism, sexism, homophobia or transphobia (including targeted misgendering, deadnaming, or promotion of so-called 'conversion therapy').
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
No harassment of other users on this or other servers.
No content illegal in the following countries: United Kingdom, Germany
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No disinformation regarding public health issues or political/military campaigns.
No spam. This includes commercial advertising, promotion of services, and SEO.
No impersonation of other individuals, public figures or organisations, unless clearly marked as a parody.
All automated (bot) accounts must enable the bot flag in their account preferences, respect #nobot markers, and post as unlisted unless making less than one post per hour.

title: Mastodon
short_description: Generic Mastodon server for anyone to use.

contact_account.note:
This account will be used by the Mastodon.world admins to make announcements about the instance.

For any assistance, please e-mail us (info@mastodon.world), as we can‚Äôt read & reply-to all DM‚Äôs.

rules.text: No illegal content, e.g. child pornography, solicitation of illegal services, etc‚Ä¶
No posts or links to content supporting, featuring, or promoting hate groups, terrorism, mass violence or calls to violence.

No posts or comments supporting or promoting QAnon related content or similarly disproven conspiracy theories. Moderators have sole discretion to decide if a post violates this rule. Birds are real. The Earth is round. Get over it.
No posts or links featuring sexualized depictions of minors, whether photographic, written, drawn, anthropomorphic or animated.
No pornography featuring depictions of rape or non-consensual violence.
A Content Warning must always be used when posting all other pornographic, erotic or NSFW content, whether photographic, written, drawn or animated.
No racism.
No visual content depicting executions, murder, suicide, dismemberment, visible innards, excessive gore, or charred bodies. All other violent imagery requires a Content Warning.
No visual content depicting animal abuse. All other posts related to animal abuse require a Content Warning.
No posting of malicious links.
No Spam (see General Guidance below).
No threats, bullying or attacks on an individual or group.
No encouragement or promotion of self-harm.
No accounts that impersonate anyone else unless clearly marked as such for the purpose of parody.

No Hate Speech. Hate speech is defined as derogatory posts or links targeting any individual or group based on race, mental or physical disability, religion, gender identity, sex, nationality, age, class or sexual orientation.
No ‚Äúshitposting‚Äù - while humorous posts are allowed, and actually encouraged, there is no place for ‚Äúshitposting‚Äù here.
No targeted misgendering, deadnaming, or promotion of so-called "conversion therapy".
Banner and Avatar images must comply with the other rules, so no NSFW images etc

rules.text: Do unto others as you think they would want done to them.
Mark sensitive content with a content warning.
Gratuitous obscenity that serves no practical benefit to a discussion is not permitted.
Illegal content such as child pornography, unsurprisingly, is not permitted
Spam is not permitted, this includes creating spam accounts that only serve to provide profile links or advertise products and services.

Hate speech and abusive or threatening behavior is not permitted, specifically that which directed at any gender, nationality, religion, race, age, pizza topping preference, or sexual identity.  One can hate on systemd all day long here.
Lack of a specific rule against a certain behavior does not indicate acceptance of that behavior.  Each of us has a limited amount of time in this world.  Don't be a jerk.
Violating one or more of these rules may result in an immediate, permanent ban without notice or warning.
You may not impersonate a person or brand without a clear indication the account is unofficial and/or a parody. Parody accounts are permitted, as are legitimate brand accounts.

No attacks against (or from) the instance.

You may not do anything which may impact confidentiality, integrity or availability of Infosec.Exchange, the users of the service or their data.
For more details see https://wiki.infosec.exchange/rules/start
No doxing (aka doxxing) or disclosing personal information without consent and as a means of harassing or causing others to harass another person.
No harassment in the form of continued engagement after a person has requested contact to stop

Automated posting:
- accounts that post >50% using automation must be labeled as a ‚Äúbot‚Äù in the user profile to help provide a visual indicator to visitors
- automated posts must be limited to one post per hour/24 per day with post visibility set to ‚Äúpublic‚Äù. There is no limit on ‚Äúunlisted‚Äù posts.
Soliciting or inciting violence or harm against a person or segment of people is not permitted.

title: Mastodon Uno Social - Italia
short_description:
Mastodon.Uno √® la prima comunit√† generalista italiana.
Con oltre 73.000 iscritti √® il pi√π grande nodo Mastodon italiano. 
Anima ambientalista a supporto della privacy e del mondo Open Source.
description:
Mastodon.uno √® il social network generalista Italiano parte della pi√π grande rete internazionale di social interconnessi liberi ed open source: Il Fediverso, un neologismo composto dall'unione di due parole "federazione" e "universo". √à un nome comune per i social network federati che funzionano con software libero aperto su pi√π di 6000 server in tutto il mondo e che al momento supera i 4 milioni di iscritti. Storicamente, questo termine ha incluso solo le piattaforme di microblogging che supportavano un insieme di protocolli chiamati OStatus. Con la comparsa e l'ampia adozione di un nuovo protocollo standard chiamato ActivityPub si √® creata un grande numero di nuovi progetti liberi che intendono dare un'alternativa ai social commerciali. I social network del Fediverso sono molto differenti rispetto alle piattaforme mainstream (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, ecc). In primo luogo, tutte le reti federate sono sviluppate da comunit√† di persone in tutto il mondo, indipendentemente da qualsiasi societ√† o istituzione ufficiale. Questo significa che puoi partecipare allo sviluppo e alla crescita del Fediverse. Tutte le competenze sono preziose: diffondere la parola, invitare amici sono attivit√† molto gradite. Un'altra differenza di questi social network dai silos aziendali √® il principio della federazione. Le reti principali concentrano milioni di utenti sui loro server. Questo d√† loro il pericoloso potere di controllare le informazioni e di accumulare i dati privati degli utenti, utilizzandoli a scopo di lucro commerciale (e chiss√† quali altr scopii). Le reti Fediverse sono progettate per essere gestite da chiunque: sei libero di scegliere e registrarti su qualsiasi server che ti piace, puoi scegliere la persona che si occuper√† dei tuoi dati - l'amministratore del tuo server. Se hai una ottima conoscenza tecnica, puoi amministrare il tuo server per i tuoi amici e la tua famiglia, collegandoti a tuo piacimento con migliaia di altri server indipendenti attraverso il web. In un certo senso, Fediverse √® un universo autonomo dove il potere e i dati sono decentralizzati e sparsi in pi√π paesi, mentre i siti web aziendali tradizionali si sono fatti ciascuno un imperatore (o un tiranno?) del proprio enorme impero, circondati da alte recinzioni, e riservano a se stessi tutte le decisioni, il controllo dei dati e la censura. Mastodon.uno √® interconnesso con tutte le reti federate ed √® interoperabile con ognuna di loro fancente capo al "Fediverso" ed √® la community italiana ad essere consigliata dal sito ufficiale di mastodon in quanto segue rigidi criteri di affidabilit√† fra cui: ci sono pi√π di un responsabile tecnico disponibile 24h in caso di problemi, garazie nel mantenere il sito attivo online, moderazione attiva contro azioni discrimitorie e di odio. Mastodon.uno √® inoltre una delle poche istanze in cui √® attiva la ricerca sul testo, che √® disattivata nella maggior parte delle istanze in quanto richiede un'enorme potenza di calcolo.

Mastodon non ti obbliga a iscriverti con il tuo nome e cognome o con il tuo numero di telefono, puoi mantenere la tua privacy ed utilizzare qualsiasi nome, abbiamo solo bisogno di una email per la verifica. Oppure al contrario se desideri avere un account con una identit√† vericata/verificabile basta inserire un piccolo script che trovi nel tuo pannello di modifica del profilo all'interno della home del tuo sito. Oppure utilizzando l'app open source keybase per verificare la propria identit√† su pi√π social: keybase su mastodon.uno, keybase √® una piattaforma con cui si pu√≤ confermare che diversi profili social facciano capo a s√© (per intenderci confermi gli account che gestisci), in modo sicuro utilizzando la crittografia. I social commerciali come facebook e twitter negli ultimi anni si sono distinti per la capacit√† di disseminare disinformazione, teorie cospirazioniste e con lo scandalo Cambridge Analytica, la manipolazione dell'opinione pubblica. Inoltre le fake news, gli haters, la profilatura e la vendita dei dati personali a scopi commerciali. Questi ed altri sono i fenomeni problematici emersi solo negli ultimi anni attorno e dentro ai social network commerciali, Facebook in primis.
Facebook, Twitter eGoogle esistono vendendo i tuoi dati a terzi inserzionisti per sovvenzionare i servizi che ricevi gratuitamente, ma questo √® molto negativo per la privacy degli utenti, perch√© le aziende sono incentivate ad abusare il pi√π possibile della tua privacy. L'alternativa √® il modello di Mastodon... abbiamo una certa percentuale di utenti che donano ed √® questo che ci sostiene.
I social come facebook e twitter devono rispondere ai loro azionisti e aumentarne i profitti, usano gli algoritmi per creare la bolla di filtraggio: una gabbia rassicurante all‚Äôinterno della quale, grazie all‚Äôintervento dei dati profilati di ogni utente, vediamo quasi esclusivamente contenuti che confermano quelle che gi√† sono le nostre credenze.

Lungi dal mantenere la promessa originaria del web, ovvero offrire agli utenti un‚Äôinformazione libera e diversificata, Facebook e compagnia non farebbero che mostrarci quello che vogliamo vedere, tenendoci spesso al riparo da informazioni che potrebbero incrinare le nostre certezze e rendere la nostra esperienza sui social media meno confortevole, questo rendere sempre pi√π piacevole il trascorrere il tempo nei social ha come effetto un aumentando della permanenza e la dipendenza da social.

Se √® vero che i social hanno accorciato le distante e favorito lo scambio e la comunicazione a distanza, √® altrettanto vero che il prezzo da pagare in termini di rinuncia alla privacy e controllo sociale √® davvero troppo alto.

Simile a Twitter nelle funzionalit√†, le caratteristiche di Mastodon Italia sono profondamente e concettualmente molto diverse, al punto di farne una sorta di anti-Facebook. Anzitutto la tutela dell'anonimato, questione maggiormente critica se consideriamo la creatura di Mark Zuckerberg. Mastodon, invece, √® pensato e sviluppato per non pubblicare n√© conservare alcun dato sensibile, a tutela della privacy degli utenti. In questo senso, dunque, non profila e non detiene alcun dato personali a scopi commerciali o politici, non utilizza pubblicit√† o script che potrebbero profilare gli utenti e venderli per scopi commerciali ma si mantiene con le donazioni su Patreon.
Il software Mastodon non monitora tutto quel genere di informazioni che invece vengono registrare da piattaforme sociali correlate come Twitter, Instagram o Facebook: non calcola chi secondo lui potrebbe diventar mio amico/a. Non registra i millisecondi su cui mi soffermo su un‚Äôimmagine, gli errori di battitura, i like, il tasso di engagement o il tipo di relazione che intercorre tra me ed un altro utente, quale sia il mio lavoro, i luoghi che visito. Non geolocalizza la mia posizione. Come vedremo, Mastodon manco mi chiede come mi chiamo e non mi obbliga nemmanco a comunicargli tutti i numeri nella mia Rubrica. Inoltre, come vedremo, puoi far s√¨ che non sia in grado di leggere quel che tu scrivi. Il software Mastodon, insomma, raccoglie giusto le informazioni tecniche necessarie a funzionare.
Mastodon non √© legato a doppio filo al tuo telefono o ad una singola app, per cui puoi accederci attraverso una delle app per android e iphone gratuite e open source, ma anche se il telefono l‚Äôavessi perso o distrutto potrai utilizzarlo. In effetti si pu√≤ benissimo usare Mastodon su PC Linux, Windows, Mac e su qualsiasi altro dispositivo via Browser senza mai dover dare il tuo numero di telefono.
Il software utilizzato dai server Mastodon √© F.L.O.S.S. ossia aperto, libero e verificabile da chiunque. Qualsiasi persona capace di programmare pu√≤ verificare ci√≤ che il software Mastodon fa, esattamente come un meccanico che pu√≤ aprire un cofano, vedere il motore, trovarne i difetti, metterci le mani e migliorarlo
Mastodon, inoltre, viene gestito in modo collettivo, senza un vero e proprio padrone, ogni contenuto inserito rimane di propriet√† dell'utente, pu√≤ essere esportato e salvato per intero e utilizzato per altre piattaforme compatibili, in questo modo non si perderanno mai i contatti e i contenuti creati.
Mastodon.uno √® autogestito ed autofinanziato, non √® una societ√† che cerca di creare profitto dalla tua vita e dai tuoi contenuti. Il tuo supporto via Patreon o Liberapay √® fondamentale per mantenere questo servizio attivo ed efficiente.





Puoi seguire Mastodon.uno sui profili ufficiali:

rules.text: No al trolling, shitposting, bodyshaming e bullismo
No alla diffusione intenzionale di notizie false, fuorvianti o manipolate e alla condivisione di informazioni con intenti antiscientifici.
No a comportamenti molesti e tossici, dogpiling o doxxing.
No al razzismo, sessismo, misoginia, omofobia, bifobia, lesbofobia, transfobia, afobia
No contenuti VM18
No al proselitismo e all'intolleranza religiosa
No apologia del fascismo - nazismo
No allo Spam, al Flood e ai Bot

No agli account che pubblicano esclusivamente contenuti generati dall'Intelligenza Artificiale.
I contenuti creati con l'uso dell'IA generativa devono essere resi noti. Nel caso ci siano dubbi sull'origine basta un riferimento all'autore/creatore o alla fonte da cui proviene l'immagine.

rules.text: Sexually explicit or violent media must be marked as sensitive & content warned when posting

Be respectful. Racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia (including targeted misgendering, deadnaming, or promotion of so-called "conversion therapy"), xenophobia, and other forms of hate and discrimination are not welcome. Your behaviour elsewhere may also be considered if brought to our attention.
No incitement of violence or promotion of discriminatory or violent ideologies
No spam, harrassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users, this includes mass and spam reporting
No content illegal in The United Kingdom
No intentionally false or misleading information. By extension, do not pose as persons of interest.
Controversial, reactionary, NSFW, and satirical or similar content may be removed if not obviously Content Warned where appropriate.
No promotion of gambling, Crypto, NFTs, anti-vaccination, self-harm, terrorism, illegal activities, Abuse/exploitation, or Violence.
The sites staff team will ultimately have the final say on any and all moderation actions.

rules.text: Respect the laws of the Netherlands and the Isle of Man, including those related to hate speech and defamation.

Threatening, abusive, intolerant or illegal behavior may lead to moderation and/or further measures. We have a zero tolerance approach to racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia. Moderation decisions are final.
The Content Warning flag should be used for NSFW content, and NSFW media should be marked as sensitive.

Account registrations are monitored and accounts considered spam (including commercial advertising, political campaigning/propaganda, duplicate accounts or impersonating legal entities) will be moderated or removed.
Do not harass or bully other users.
Do not share illegal or copyrighted content.
Do not spam or engage in any form of malicious activity.
Keep discussions civil and respectful, and refrain from using derogatory language or engaging in personal attacks.
Do not reveal personal information about other people without their consent.
Use appropriate tags and content warnings when posting potentially sensitive or triggering content.
If you see a violation of these rules, report it to the moderation team.
To use our service, you are at least 18 years old.

Falls du einen NSFW-Only Account erstellen m√∂chtest, ziehe eventuell eine andere Instanz in Betracht. Wahrscheinlich sind wir leider nicht geeignet f√ºr dich.
Wir dulden keine Bel√§stigung, einschlie√ülich Brigading, Dogpiling oder jede andere Form der Kontaktaufnahme mit einem Nutzer, der angegeben hat, dass er nicht kontaktiert werden m√∂chte.

Inhalte, die in Deutschland illegal sind, werden gel√∂scht und k√∂nnen zur sofortigen Sperrung des Kontos f√ºhren.

rules.text:
Discrimination & Bigotry Won‚Äôt Be Tolerated.

We're not a free speech absolutist. We're not interested in Nazis, TERFS, or hate speech. Targeted misgendering, deadnaming, or promotion of so-called "conversion therapy" is prohibited.

Respect Other Users.

This instance is meant to be a friendly, welcoming space to all who are willing to reciprocate in helping to create that environment.

Consent is Important in all contexts.

If you‚Äôre ever unsure, ask first. Use content warnings (CWs) where required.

Listen; Don‚Äôt Make Excuses.

If you‚Äôre accused of causing harm, either take some responsibility or ask moderators for help.

No Pedophilia or Zoophilia.

This includes artistic depictions of characters that cannot give consent.

Members under the age of 18 are not permitted to post lewd, explicit, nsfw, or otherwise sexual content. This includes as original posts or in reply to other members, as well as boosting content of this type from their accounts.
No direct threats and incitement to violence. Expressing dissatisfaction is fine, but directly stating interest or intent to commit violent harm are not welcome on this server.

Use the Report Feature.
Our moderators are here to listen and respond to reports.

rules.text: We do not tolerate discriminatory behavior and content promoting or advocating the oppression of members of marginalized groups.

We do not tolerate threatening behavior, stalking, doxxing, or harassment (including brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted).
We do not tolerate violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
We do not tolerate conspiracy narratives or other reactionary myths supporting or leading to the above-mentioned (and/or similar) behavior.
All explicit (NSFW) content must be marked as sensitive and have a content warning. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.
Content that is illegal in Germany will be deleted and may lead to immediate account suspension.

title: DEF CON Social
short_description: DEFCON.social is a place for hackers, researchers, artists, infosec, cyberpunks & those interested in the intersection of technology and society.

contact_account.note: The official Support account for DEFCON.social

fields.value: https://www.defcon.social/

rules.text: DEFCON.social is an inclusive instance and will moderate against bigotry, homophobia, supremacy, and edge-lord behavior
We don't condone harassment against any user, for any reason. Harassment can be generally or specifically targeted to make users feel uncomfortable, unwelcome, or afraid

Participants asked to stop any harassing behavior are expected to comply immediately. Anyone can report harassment. If you are being harassed, notice that someone else is being harassed, or have any other concerns, you can report
Follow our Code of Conduct https://defcon.org/html/links/dc-code-of-conduct.html
Don't break laws here, ask others to break laws here, admit to breaking laws
Pornography, Nudity, Links to illegal content, spam and commercial advertising are forbidden. Promoting your own projects in moderation is OK
Be polite: Mark a CW for spoilers
No account impersonation. If you claim you are the BBC World News and you aren't, don't be surprised if your account is suspended. Identity is tricky enough as it is
Mark your account type as "Bot" if you act like a bot or are one. For example automated posting or re-posting of other accounts
You must be at least 13 years old to create an account (US COPA, CCPA, UK AADC, etc.)

rules.text: Posts that contain nudity, sexually explicit, or violent content must be marked with an "NSFW" content warning, and media marked as sensitive when posting.
rules.hint: See https://fedi.tips/how-to-use-content-warnings-cws-on-mastodon-and-the-fediverse/ for how to use CW.

rules.text: No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or casteism
rules.hint: This rule is written as it is on mastodon.social as well as many other generalist instances. The omission of any specific term is not intentional, and bad faith attempts to challenge the exact terminology are considered to be in violation of the rule.

rules.text: No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
No content illegal in the United States, Germany, or Finland
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information

Bots must be marked as bots in their profile preferences, and automated posts should be unlisted (exceptions apply). Twitter-mirroring instances like BirdsiteLIVE will be suspended, if you want to browse Twitter, use Twitter.
rules.hint: Any accounts that produce automated posts and do not plan to manually respond to replies are considered "bots" here. This rule applies to all bots, other than local accounts that provide content of general public interest AND post at an average frequency of at most once per hour with reasonable spacing. Other exceptions may be granted on a case-by-case basis.

rules.text: Do not spam or abuse network features.
You must select the appropriate language for each post.
rules.hint: See https://fedi.tips/setting-your-language-preferences-on-mastodon-and-filtering-out-posts-in-other-languages/. This is necessary for the proper functioning of the timeline language filter. If a post is in multiple languages, choose one that represents a significant part of the post.

rules.text: Please read https://mpp.bus-hit.me for moderation information and best practices.

rules.text: Be friendly and polite to each other
No hate speech, no discrimination of others, regardless of their age, gender, nationality or whatever
No spamming of any kind.
Don't annoy others and don't get easily annoyed by others.
No advertisements of commercial products.
No distribution of copyrighted material.
Do not upload material for which you don't have the rights
No automated posts by bots, except when you have permission to do so by the server admins
Don't abuse this service or server.
Treat other how you want to be treated by them - with respect!

This is a service running on a private server and as a friendly user you are welcome to use this service, but in the end the server admin can cancel user accounts and will do when the user misbehaves. The admin will decide in the end.
Valid mail address required! You'll receive reminder mail after 6 months of inactivity to log in again. If you don't react to those mails, your account will be deleted after 7 months of inactivity.
Allowed languages are German and English as main languages while as the following languages are tolerated: Dutch, French, Spanish, Italian.

This service is free of cost for you.
However offering this service does have cost implications. If you can afford some cents per week it would be great when you could contribute in sharing the server costs. Of course this voluntarily for you.

No free-speech extremists, no far-right extremists, no nationalists. This includes people that elect or support such political parties like AfD in Germany, Fratelli d'Italia in Italy or Rassemblement National in France, etc.. If you support these parties, this instance is not for you.
Alt Texts for Pictures encouraged. Please conduct descriptive texts for pictures you upload (Alt Texts). This helps visually impaired users and others enormously in their online life.

title: Mastodon.eus
short_description:
Mastodon.eus euskara eta euskal kulturaren komunitatearentzat sortutako Mastodon instantzia bat da.

2018an hauek sortua: Azkue Fund, Dinahosting, iametza, Laborategia.eus, PuntuEUS eta Talaios Koop
description: Euskal komunitatearen fedibertsoko txokoa mastodon.eus euskal komunitateak sare sozial libre eta deszentralizatu honetan bere espazioa izan dezan helburuarekin abiatu da. Ez dakizu zer den Mastodon? Zalantzak dituzu? kaixo.mastodon.eus webgunean informazio interesgarria aurkituko duzu: * Nola hasi atala: Kontua sortu, pertsonalizatu eta lehen toot-a bidaltzeko pausoz pausoko azalpenak *Ohiko galderak atala: Mastodoni buruzko ohiko zalantzak, kontzeptuak eta terminologia, erabiltzaileak eta kontuak, aplikazioak, mastodon.eus... Prentsa atala: Kazetari, blogari eta abarrentzat materiala. Momentuz Mastodon.eus eta Mastodon logoak. Aurrerago material gehiago mastodon.eus hainbat eragileren arteko elkarlanetik jaio da, denboran irauteko helburuarekin eta euskarazko komunitatearen inguruan sor daitezkeen bestelako instantziekin erkatzeko borondatearekin, baita, beronen inguruan eragile gehiago biltzen joateko asmoarekin ere. Hasiera batean honako erakunde eta pertsonen ekimenez abiatu da egitasmo hau: *PuntuEUS Fundazioa *Azkue Fundazioa *Iametza *Laborategia 2.0 *Talaios Koop. *Dinahosting

title: Mastodon NZ
short_description:
A Mastodon instance hosted in New Zealand. Made for kiwis and honorary kiwis home and abroad!

Status page @ https://status.fediservices.nz/
description:
A Mastodon server hosted in New Zealand.

Donations to assist with costs are greatly appreciated but not required - https://opencollective.com/nz-federated-services

contact_account.note:
Administrative account for mastodon.nz.

This instance is run by volunteers, feel free to support us here to assist with costs: https://donate.deadnet.nz/ <3

Moderators can be found here - @themods

rules.text: You must read the rules.

You MUST describe your link to NZ as part of your reason for wanting to join on the next page. Applications without this will be declined. You must be a kiwi or honorary kiwi, at home or abroad, to join Mastodon.nz.
You may only have one account on Mastodon.nz and be at least 13 years of age.
Personal accounts only. We do not allow bots, commercial, business, organisation or purely promotional accounts.
Automated cross-posting from other services such as twitter is considered to be a bot and is not allowed. If you have a blog or something and you want feed that through, this is generally fine.

No spamming. The occasional mention of your shop, fundraiser etc. is fine. It's hard to give a defined daily limit of what constitutes spam. Personal or professional (i.e. Mutual Aid/Kickstarters) fundraisers must be clearly tagged as such.

Content Warnings are mandatory on posts containing gore and/or violence. Posts about politics must be tagged one or more of #nzpol, #t≈çrangap≈´, #pol, and/or #politics, and optionally may be content warned.
No impersonation of others. We may consider obvious parody accounts, but they must be agreed with @theMods in advance.
No hate speech, racism, sexism, ableism, homophobia or transphobia.
No illegal content, gore or violence for the sake of it, incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies or conspiracy theories.
No NSFW content. A bit of casual swearing is fine, but don't be derogatory or aggressive to other users (see rule 12).
Be kind. No abuse or harassment will be tolerated.
No doxxing other users.
Content hosted on Mastodon.nz or produced by its users may not be reused outside of the fediverse without the express permission of the author(s).
Mastodon.nz complies with copyright laws. We expect you to as well. Your content must be your own or acceptable use.

Image descriptions: It is expected that users will add image descriptions to their uploads for
our visually impaired users. Unless there is a reason you can not, you must do so.
Copy of rules with more detailed guidance can be found at https://mastodon.nz/rules.pdf

rules.text:
No bots

... unless they're cute, funny, or useful. Bots should avoid posting to the public timeline.
No pornography or nudity, or something that would be considered "NSFW" in a workplace, even behind a NSFW warning. In particular, no sexual depictions of children.
No gore or graphic violence. Again, if you wouldn't post it at work, you definitely shouldn't be posting it here.
Use content warnings. Content that is borderline NSFW or could be construed as NSFW at a glance should be put behind a CW (Content Warning)
No racism. This should go without saying, but unfortunately it doesn't.

No sexism

... or pretty much any other -ism

No discrimination. Any discrimination based on gender, sexual minority, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, religion (or lack thereof), or national origin, will result in your account and content being removed.
No xenophobia. This includes violent nationalism.
No holocaust denialism. No Nazi symbolism, promotion of National Socialism, or anything that is illegal in the European Union
No stalking or harassment of any kind

No fake accounts, even celebrity joke accounts.

Note this rule does not necessarily apply to remote accounts.
No "follow bots." We block these and our instance is on a "no bots" list

No advertising or excessive promotion. By far the biggest problem we've had running this server are spam accounts that sign up only to promote some company (often nothing even to do with Ruby), and so we take a fairly strong stance against letting such accounts even register on the server now.

description: sciences.social is an online community for social scientists (as opposed to scientists who just want to be social). Use this site to announce a paper acceptance or R&R, comment on recent research, ask for advice on syllabi, and more. To help keep things civil, we use our outside names and our inside voices. We stand for climate justice, which includes justice for all marginalized people as well as other living beings and we stand against discrimination and exploitation.
rules.hint: We are allies to disabled people, queer and lgbtqia* people, BIPoC, women, poor people, kids and future generations as well as other vulnerable groups including animals, plants and all living beings. We might be critical to religion in general, but stand up against antisemitism, islamomisia and other forms of discrimination due to religious background. We acknowledge our own privileges and work on our own unintentionally discriminatory behaviors. We are all part of an exploitative system and it's impossible to live within that system without harming anyone. We are aware of that and try to work against it, but we are not all fossil free and vegan and that's okay. We don't exclusively post about climate justice, but at least some of our posts should be about climate justice.

rules.text: We consider ourselves on the left side of the political spectrum and stand up against right wing ideologies.
rules.hint: We have different political views, but are all on the left side or at least are left-open, but right-closed centrists. We stand together against capitalism and fascism and even if we disagree on important issues we don't loose sight of our common goals.

rules.text: We believe the Fediverse should be a place for respectful discourse and we stand against harassment, trolling and spam.
rules.hint: Everybody's boundaries are to be respected.

rules.text: We stand up for peace and against violence, oppression and authoritarianism.
rules.hint: We are pacifists, but acknowledge that when attacked, people have the right to defend themselves following international law. We may be critical of states in general, but we never deny any country their statehood. We condemn violence against innocent people and always show solidarity with victims of violence. We don't promote violence in protest, but peaceful sabotage against oppressors is not violence.

rules.text: We stand behind the science and against fake-news & propaganda.
rules.hint: We are not all scientists ourselves and experts in every field we post about, but we try not to spread any false information. If possible we provide reliable sources. We don't spread unverified rumors.

rules.text: Also, we stick to Austrian and EU law and we don't post pornography.
We try to follow the following guidelines
rules.hint:
If you can, please provide media descriptions if you post images or videos. There is a "caption" field available for that once you add media to a post you create. If you can't (atm) write a caption for whatever reason, that is okay - nobody should force or shame you. But if possible then please add the hashtag #AltForMe so someone else may write a caption for your media.

Please try to use CamelCase in your hashtags to make them more readable (also for screenreaders). Camel Case means you capitalize each first letter of a word when the hashtag consists of more than one word (or a not very common compound word).

Try not to overdo it with emojis, as they are each read out loud by screenreaders and that can be really annoying to hear, especially since some emojis are represented by a lot of text.

Please try to use the content warning (CW) feature when you write about something that might upset someone. We don't provide any rules as to what type of content should be hidden behind a CW, but try to think for yourself.

Please also hide media that might be upsetting as "sensitive".

If there is any way, please try to avoid linking to websites that violate visitors' privacy. Sometimes you'll find the same content you want to link to on a privacy respecting website or there is a proxy/mirroring service or archive available. If you can't find an alternative please make sure you don't post a shortened url, so people know what they click on.

rules.text: Disclaimer
rules.hint: Principles, rules and guidelines may change at any time and sanctions may be applied according to rules that have not been written yet at that time, but of course never without justification. Appeal is always possible.

title: Metalhead.club

description:
Metalhead.club is a Mastodon instance hosted in Germany and powered by 100% green energy. Mastodon is a free and decentralized alternative to well-established social microblogging platforms like Twitter. This instance is especially addressing Metal fans, but of course everybody is welcome to use metalhead.club. If you're using this Mastodon instance, please consider a single donation or monthly, recurring donations via LiberaPay to keep this instance metalling hard.

rules.text: Please don't post anything that's illegal in the US or EU.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, or any other form of discrimination.

Punch Nazis, trebuchet TERFs. Any posts or usage containing nazi symbolism or ideology, or which contains "gender critical" / "just asking questions" shit will get you banned immediately and without recourse.
No promotion of crypto or NFTs.
NSFW content must be behind a content warning / marked as sensitive. Your profile (avatar, header, display name, etc.) must be SFW.
Don't abuse the instance or use it to abuse other federated instances. Don't try to break things.

Be considerate. Keep in mind that any public post you make will appear in our public timeline and the public timelines of other instances federated with Urbanists.Social. Use content warnings where appropriate. Use NSWF tags where appropriate. Don't be a jerk about it.
Bots are allowed, but don't make them annoying. Admins will ask you to move your bot to another instance if it becomes a problem.
Do not harass other users.

rules.text: Violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting

rules.hint: This rule is written as it is on mastodon.social as well as many other generalist instances. The omission of any specific term is not intentional, and bad faith attempts to challenge the exact terminology are considered to be in violation of the rule.

rules.text: No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users
No content illegal in the United States, Germany, or Finland
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information
Bots must be marked as bots in their profile preferences, and automated posts should be unlisted.
rules.hint: Any accounts that produce automated posts and do not plan to manually respond to replies are considered "bots" here. This rule applies to all bots, other than local accounts that provide content of general public interest AND post at an average frequency of at most once per hour with reasonable spacing. Other exceptions may be granted on a case-by-case basis.

rules.text: You must select the appropriate language for each post.
rules.hint: See https://fedi.tips/setting-your-language-preferences-on-mastodon-and-filtering-out-posts-in-other-languages/. This is necessary for the proper functioning of the timeline language filter. If a post is in multiple languages, choose one that represents a significant part of the post.

rules.text: Do not spam or abuse network features.
Please read https://mpp.bus-hit.me for moderation information and best practices.

title: Todon.eu
short_description: Radical leftist anti-authoritarian. For anarchists, socialists, (climate) activists, LGBTQIA+, anti-racists, anti-fascists, anti-capitalists, intersectionalists, human rights, animal rights, etc. [sign-up using a webbrowser]
description:
Todon.eu is a radical leftist anti-authoritarian Mastodon server. We welcome anarchists, socialists, activists, the LGBTQIA+ community, environmentalists, anti-racists, anti-fascists, anti-capitalists, intersectionalists, vegans, pirates, human rights activists, etc. As far as they are radical, leftist √°nd anti-authoritarian.



Deutsch

Todon.eu ist ein linksradikaler, antiautorit√§rer Mastodon-Server. Wir hei√üen Anarchist_innen, Sozialist_innen, Aktivist_innen, die LGBTQIA+-Gemeinschaft, Umweltbewegung, Antirassist_innen, Antifaschist_innen, Antikapitalist_innen, Intersektionalist_innen, Veganer_innen, Pirat_innen, Menschenrechtler_innen, etc. willkommen. Solange sie radikal, links √∫nd antiautorit√§r sind.



Espa√±ol

Todon.eu es un servidor de Mastodon de izquierda radical antiautoritaria. Damos la bienvenida a anarquistas, socialistas, activistas, personas del colectivo LGBTQIA+, ambientalistas, anti-racistas, anti-fascistas, anti-capitalistas, interseccionalistas, veganxs, piratas, activistas por los derechos humanos, etc. Siempre que sean radicales, de izquierdas y antiautoritarios.



Nederlands

Todon.eu is een radicaal linkse anti-autoritaire Mastodonserver. Wij verwelkomen anarchisten, socialisten, activisten, de LHBTQIA+-community, de milieubeweging, intersectionelen, antiracisten, antifascisten, antikapitalisten, veganisten, piraten, mensenrechtenactivisten, enz. Als ze maar radicaal, links √©n anti-autoritair zijn.



More

See todon.eu/about/more for more information in above languages, and links to machine translations in even more languages, our privacy police and of course our Terms of Service.

rules.text: We do not accept racism (in all its forms, incl. hate against Muslims, antisemitism, apartheid and casteism - see our Terms of Service for our complete definition).
We do not accept hate against lesbians, gays, bisexuals, pansexuals,  transgenders, non-binary people, intersexual people, queer people in general, etc.
Sexism, misogyny and hate against black women (misogynoir).
We do not accept ableism (incl. COVID-19 denial/downplaying and anti-vax) and body-shaming.
We do not accept harassment and trolling.
We also do not accept other forms of hate speech.
We do not accept (sexual) abuse of minors, adults and animals (also not virtual).
We do not accept glorification of non-political violence, calls for murder, death threats, terrorism and militarism.

We do not accept (neo)colonialism (incl. Zionism), imperialism in all forms and nationalism (above all nationalism of nation states,  incl. flags/symbols of those on Todon.*, see our Terms of Service).
We do not accept fascism, right-wing populism, and right-wing and religious extremism.
We do not accept evangelisation and other forms of religious propaganda [local only], and extreme sects and cults.
We do not accept Marxist-Leninists (Stalinists, Maoists, etc) or other followers of extreme authoritarian (so called) communist/socialist ideologies/regimes (aka tankies).
We do not accept capitalists, including so called 'anarcho-capitalists' (aka ancaps) and neoliberals.
We do not accept anthropogenic climate change denial, downplaying the climate crisis, greenwashing and deceptive climate solutions (like nuclear energy).
We do not accept (right-wing) conspiracy 'theories', hoaxes, fake news and other forms of disinformation.
We do not accept posting content created by AI (artificial 'intelligence'), like art, music or text [local only].
Another rule in our terms of service at wiki.todon.eu/todon/terms_en. Explain in the final step (reports only).

rules.text: Rule #1 ‚Äì Illegal Content or Conduct
rules.hint:
Content or conduct that is illegal in the United States is strictly prohibited.

For the avoidance of doubt, this includes but is not limited to: Instructions on how to commit crimes, encouraging acts of violence or terrorism, child sexual abuse material (CSAM) or depictions thereof, and unauthorized access or exploitation of computer systems.

rules.text: Rule #2 ‚Äì Discriminatory Conduct
rules.hint: Racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, and other discrimination is prohibited. Users who engage in such conduct are not welcome on our platform.

rules.text: Rule #3 ‚Äì Stalking and Harassment
rules.hint:
Respect other users of our service and other federated instances. If someone doesn‚Äôt want anything to do with you, leave them alone. Attempts to bypass blocks, including creating alternate accounts for that purpose, is prohibited.

‚ÄúScreenshot dunking‚Äù, or the act of taking screenshots of posts to repost and harass without directly replying, is strongly discouraged. If someone is annoying you, harassing you, or a genuine danger to other users, block and report them.

rules.text: Rule #4 ‚Äì Misinformation and Deceptive Content
rules.hint:
Misinformation, scams, Ponzi schemes, and other deceptive tactics have become rampant on other platforms and we don‚Äôt want to see a resurgence of it in the Fediverse.

Examples of prohibited content include, but are not limited to, the following: COVID and health misinformation, pro-insurrection (Jan 6th) comments or endorsement, NFTs, ‚Äúcrypto‚Äù (blockchain & tokens, NOT cryptography), MLMs / pyramid schemes, flat earth claims.

rules.text: Rule #5 ‚Äì Missing Content Warning
rules.hint: Content warnings (CW) are REQUIRED for NSFW content, political discussion and debate, religious promotion and debate, and drug mentions. Please review https://pawb.social/post/101 for more information.

rules.text: Rule #5.2 ‚Äì Sensitive Content in Content Warning Message
rules.hint: Don't put polarizing, graphic, or sensitive content in the content warning (CW) description.

rules.text: Rule #6 ‚Äì No Spam or Advertising
rules.hint: Spam and advertising is not acceptable, but friendly automated bots are welcome. Where possible, try to restrict any recurring automated posts to Unlisted to avoid cluttering the Local and Federated timeline. Content posted by small businesses is NOT considered advertising for the purposes of this rule.

rules.text: Rule #7 ‚Äì Disengage and Report Abuse
rules.hint:
If a user or instance is breaking the rules, we recommend just reporting the content and not engaging. We don‚Äôt want users to end up getting caught in the crossfire for attempting to correct a user in good faith, as this makes our jobs significantly harder.

Additionally, the team is here to help ‚Äì If you‚Äôre unsure on a particular post, user profile, instance, etc. and don‚Äôt think we‚Äôve seen or dealt with it yet, please send in a report. No user will ever be penalized for genuine use of the report system.

rules.text: Rule #8.1 ‚Äì Account / Post Language Missing
rules.hint: We require that all posts are properly marked with the language used, which can be done at the account level through the account preferences page, or per-post by clicking the language button next to ‚ÄúCW‚Äù (Content Warning).

rules.text: Rule #8.2 ‚Äì Account Impersonation
rules.hint: You may not impersonate an individual, group, or organization with the intent to deceive, confuse, and exploit other users. Parody accounts should tag themselves clearly in their profile description.

rules.text: Rule #8.3 ‚Äì Unmarked Bot Account
rules.hint: Bot accounts must mark themselves as a bot and must post using ‚ÄúUnlisted‚Äù, ‚ÄúFollowers only‚Äù, or ‚ÄúMentioned people only‚Äù, so we can keep the local and federated timelines clear and focused on users.

rules.text: Rule #8.4 ‚Äì Unauthorized Brand / Government Accounts
rules.hint: No brand or government-affiliated account may be registered on Pawb.Social services without prior written and publicly recorded approval, except furry fandom-operated brands and events covered by the exception in our full rules. This rule ONLY applies to accounts on Pawb.Social services.

rules.text: Rule #8.5 ‚Äì Bypassing Suspension
rules.hint: If you have been suspended from any Pawb.Social instance, you may not create another account on any of our services.

rules.text: Rule #8.6 ‚Äì Prohibited Avatar / Header Image
rules.hint: All avatars and header images must not contain any content that is prohibited by any other rule in the Code of Conduct, especially content that requires a Content Warning (CW).

rules.text: Full Code of Conduct
rules.hint: The full Code of Conduct can be found at https://docs.google.com/document/d/1jXkulJKMWEmv-cb_jaYkG2L0sTcZeHKdcqwImNkf6Ko ‚Äì Some rules and wording listed here have been summarized for brevity.

rules.text:
Be nice to each other. No shitposting on this server.
Trolls will not be tolerated. Please act in a civilized manner.
No porn, explicit or violent media, racism, sexism, fascism, homophobia, or any other form of abusive behavior, harassment or hate speech.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No doxxing of users. Any form of harassment will not be tolerated.
No content illegal in Belgium or, by extension, EU law.

No intentional spreading of fake news, false information or misleading content.
This includes attempts to impersonate Mastodon staff.
No spam or advertising.

Politics and religion is tolerated but discouraged. Please use a Content Warning if you do post them.
Whatever your political or religious view may be is your concern but we'd appreciate it if you wouldn't use this platform to plaster it in other people's faces.

Please don't bring discussions from other Social Media channels over to Mastodon.
If you want to discuss a topic, please do it on the originating side.

If you're a commercial or government entity or you represent one, please consider hosting your own Mastodon instance.
This instance is set up and paid for by volunteers in order to give users access to the Fediverse.
It's not intended to be used as a commercial or governmental platform.

This is a private Mastodon instance, access to this server is a privilege and not a right.
The right to access and/or use this server may be revoked at any given time.

Interpretation of these rules is up to the server's admin discretion and is not open for discussion.
They may change without prior notice.

rules.text: Be yourself. Be genuine. Make connections. Have fun. We welcome you to post about topics outside of gaming as well!
We have a zero-tolerance policy for hate speech (racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia/transmisia, misgendering/dead naming, xenophobia, ableism, etc) or illegal activity of any kind.

Be respectful to others. No harassment or trolling is allowed. No sexually explicit or violent posts. No personal attacks of any kind (bullying, trolling, name-calling, etc) or spreading of disinformation.

Users are expected to behave as a person and not a brand or storefront. Self-promotion is allowed and encouraged (ex. going live posts, links to personal content creation), but please do not spam the Local feed or send direct messages to advertise. Paid advertising/links of any kind is not allowed.

Use 'Content Warnings' (CWs) on your posts with respect for your fellow users (i.e. politics, graphic imagery, spoilers, personal topics, etc). In addition, NSFW posts require a Content Warning (CW) AND a Sensitive Media tag. Please add Alt Text descriptions to images and media where appropriate.

Crossposting using a 3rd party app is OK: Those posts MUST be posted as Unlisted or Followers-only and cannot be listed as Public. Accounts here are expected to be created with the intention of interacting with the community directly. Accounts that appear to be bots will be suspended.
No promotion or discussion of Cryptocurrency, NFTs, or multi-level marketing schemes is allowed.

IMPORTANT: By applying, you agree to the server rules. **PLEASE GIVE A GENUINE REASON why you would like to join.** Applications with short generic answers (i.e. ‚ÄúI like games‚Äù or ‚Äúleaving Twitter‚Äù) will be declined. *We are an English-speaking server* Thanks!

title: People Making Games
short_description: We're a community of folks who celebrate the craft of creating interactive experiences, whether they're working in games or around them! This is a space for games folks and creatives to call home!
description:
We're building a community that celebrates games and the craft of creating interactive experiences. It's a space to play together, share with each other, learn new things, build connections, and help one other grow! We take the broad view of the term "Game Maker". Whether you're in games or around them, fresh faced or veteran, digital or physical, this is a space for you, a home in the Fediverse!

Our instance is built around invites to facilitate organic growth, and all invited members are approved immediately. The hope is that, by letting friends invite friends, we can maintain a positive and supportive culture with strong connections between each and every member. If you know somebody who's already on the server, consider reaching out to them! 

Don't know anyone but feel like this is a place you'd like to be a part of? Feel free to request access! Please let us know a bit about you, and other places to find you, so we can process your request quickly!

contact_account.note:
ADHD ‚Ä¢ :ms_genderfluid_flag: :ms_bisexual_flag: ‚Ä¢ They/He ‚Ä¢ Game Maker ‚Ä¢ DRE @ Meta Quest

Hi there! I'm Ted, and I've been a game developer for ~15 years!

Check my site for
‚Ä¢ What I‚Äôve Done
‚Ä¢ What I Do
‚Ä¢ How to Reach Me
‚Ä¢ Open-Office Hours for Students, Hobbyists, and Independents

I'm also building https://peoplemaking.games as a home base for all sorts of folks who make games happen!

Mastodon Welcome Guide - https://tinyurl.com/welcome-to-mastodon

#gamedev #indiedev #gamebiz #fedi22

rules.text: Be respectful of one another

No discrimination or harassment, including but not limited to racism, sexism, ableism, homophobia or transphobia.

In regards to PeopleMaking.Games' stance on recent "Mastodon Discourse": Tone policing marginalized groups is tantamount to harassment. It is not productive or useful.
No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies.
No explicit (NSFW) content without content warnings and/or sensitive media markers. Explicit content must not be used in user avatars or header images.

Provide appropriate content warnings on potentially sensitive posts. We permit and even encourage topical discussions, but ask that you respect the rights of others to have autonomy over the content they engage with.
Posts containing art not owned by the poster must be credited, ideally with a link back to the source.
The actions of individuals you bring to the community reflect back on you. Be responsible with your invites, and avoid posting an invite link in a public place.
Mastodon v4 does not currently support badging for given roles. Until there is a UI implementation, using the "Astro" logo in your username is restricted to Moderators and Administrators. Thank you!

No NFTs, Crypto, or Web3 promotion. While these topics can be discussed at a distance, preferably behind CWs, if your primary reason for being here is to monetize via Web3 there are more suitable crypto-related instances available. NFTs may not be used in profile pictures.

description:
Bonn.social ist ein soziales Netzwerk f√ºr mit Fokus auf Bonn, Rhein-Sieg und Region und ist ein Teil des Fediverse.

  • Es funktioniert so √§hnlich wie Twitter, aber man hat 500 Zeichen zur Verf√ºgung und mehr Einstellungen f√ºr die Privatsph√§re.
  • Es funktioniert so √§hnlich wie E-Mail, weil jeder seinen eigenen Server betreiben kann, trotzdem kann jeder mit jedem im Netzwerk schreiben.
  • Die Software f√ºr dieses Netzwerk hei√üt Mastodon. Es ist eine freie Software, jeder kann sie nutzen und den gesamten Quellcode lesen.
  • Auch deine Daten sind hier frei. Du kannst jederzeit deine Follows und Daten exportieren und zu einem anderen Server umziehen oder einen eigenen Server betreiben (lassen).

Bonn.social ist eine Mastodon-Instanz von Bonn.digital f√ºr Bonn-Rhein-Sieg und einfach alle, die die Region m√∂gen. Thema darf nat√ºrlich gerne Bonn sein, muss es aber nicht. Die Regeln werden von den Bonn.social-Administratoren und -Moderatoren so entwickelt, dass sich alle hier wohlf√ºhlen k√∂nnen.

Wenn Du uns freiwillig unterst√ºtzen m√∂chtest, findest Du hier weitere Informationen: Bonn.social unterst√ºtzen!. Etwas zwischen 1-5‚Ç¨ monatlich bzw. 12-60‚Ç¨ j√§hrlich sind ein guter Richtwert. Mehr ist auch ok.

rules.text: Be excellent to each other
Pornography or Rule 34 content of any kind is not permitted. NSFW content (i.e. artistic nudity) must be hidden behind a content warning, the NSFW filter, or marked as unlisted/private.

Incessant posting, soapboxing, campaigning, or harassment for any cause/belief/opinion violates rule no. 1 and is not tolerated. Accounts that engage in such behaviour publicly or direct it towards other users will be terminated.

Please do not spam or advertise for third parties/sponsors. This includes and is not limited to: selling items that are not your own creation, selling toots or offering toots for sale, and acting as a dealer engaged in trade.
Please report violations of these rules to the admin.
This instance is hosted by Masto.host and abides by its terms of service. The server is located in the EU in France and obeys all applicable laws.
Using Socel to circumvent restrictions or suspensions on other fediverse servers will result in your account being immediately terminated without warning.

NFT and other blockchain-based works in any form are prohibited; even if they are your own creation. Please do not post, share, promote, offer for sale, or otherwise engage in trade, any work based on these technologies.

rules.text: Live and let live: do not discriminate against anyone. Racist, sexist, misogynist, homophobic, anti-Semitic and other misanthropic posts are forbidden here!
Don't be an asshole. You have an opinion? That's fine, but please don't insult anyone with your comments.
Freedom of speech does not mean freedom from criticism. Just because you are allowed to express your opinion doesn't mean you can't get any opposition for it.
Adhere to laws. It's simple. The Internet is not a legal vacuum.
We do not tolerate harassment, including brigading, dogpiling or any other form of contact with a user who has indicated that they do not wish to be contacted.

Don't make fun of others and don't be condescending. You too want to be treated with respect. Note that irony, sarcasm, or similar expressions do not translate well into written language and tend to escalate discussions or misunderstandings.
We do not tolerate conspiracy theories
Content that is illegal in Germany will be deleted and may result in immediate account suspension. For example online casinos without a proper license will immediately be suspended.
NSFW content must be labeled as such using a content warning

Automated posts should be posted as "Unlisted" (i.e. they are visible but not in the local timeline). This also applies to bots, feed posters, Twitter "retweets" and Twitter crossposts. Crossposter accounts that do not actively participate may be removed by us.
You are not allowed to plainly advertise your company without providing a benefit for the viewer

rules.text: We do not accept racism (in all its forms, incl. hate against Muslims, antisemitism, apartheid and casteism - see our Terms of Service for our complete definition).
We do not accept hate against lesbians, gays, bisexuals, pansexuals,  transgenders, non-binary people, intersexual people, queer people in general, etc.
Sexism, misogyny and hate against black women (misogynoir).
We do not accept ableism (incl. COVID-19 denial/downplaying and anti-vax) and body-shaming.
We do not accept harassment and trolling.
We also do not accept other forms of hate speech.
We do not accept (sexual) abuse of minors, adults and animals (also not virtual).
We do not accept glorification of non-political violence, calls for murder, death threats, terrorism and militarism.

We do not accept (neo)colonialism (incl. Zionism), imperialism in all forms and nationalism (above all nationalism of nation states,  incl. flags/symbols of those on Todon.*, see our Terms of Service).
We do not accept fascism, right-wing populism, and right-wing and religious extremism.
We do not accept evangelisation and other forms of religious propaganda [local only], and extreme sects and cults.
We do not accept Marxist-Leninists (Stalinists, Maoists, etc) or other followers of extreme authoritarian (so called) communist/socialist ideologies/regimes (aka tankies).
We do not accept capitalists, including so called 'anarcho-capitalists' (aka ancaps) and neoliberals.
We do not accept anthropogenic climate change denial, downplaying the climate crisis, greenwashing and deceptive climate solutions (like nuclear energy).
We do not accept (right-wing) conspiracy 'theories', hoaxes, fake news and other forms of disinformation.
We do not accept posting content created by AI (artificial 'intelligence'), like art, music or text [local only].
Another rule in our terms of service at wiki.todon.eu/todon/terms_en. Explain in the final step.

rules.text: Rule #1 ‚Äì Illegal Content or Conduct
rules.hint:
Content or conduct that is illegal in the United States is strictly prohibited.

For the avoidance of doubt, this includes but is not limited to: Instructions on how to commit crimes, encouraging acts of violence or terrorism, child sexual abuse material (CSAM) or depictions thereof, and unauthorized access or exploitation of computer systems.

rules.text: Rule #2 ‚Äì Discriminatory Conduct
rules.hint: Racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, and other discrimination is prohibited. Users who engage in such conduct are not welcome on our platform.

rules.text: Rule #3 ‚Äì Stalking and Harassment
rules.hint:
Respect other users of our service and other federated instances. If someone doesn‚Äôt want anything to do with you, leave them alone. Attempts to bypass blocks, including creating alternate accounts for that purpose, is prohibited.

‚ÄúScreenshot dunking‚Äù, or the act of taking screenshots of posts to repost and harass without directly replying, is strongly discouraged. If someone is annoying you, harassing you, or a genuine danger to other users, block and report them.

rules.text: Rule #4 ‚Äì Misinformation and Deceptive Content
rules.hint:
Misinformation, scams, Ponzi schemes, and other deceptive tactics have become rampant on other platforms and we don‚Äôt want to see a resurgence of it in the Fediverse.

Examples of prohibited content include, but are not limited to, the following: COVID and health misinformation, pro-insurrection (Jan 6th) comments or endorsement, NFTs, ‚Äúcrypto‚Äù (blockchain & tokens, NOT cryptography), MLMs / pyramid schemes, flat earth claims.

rules.text: Rule #5 ‚Äì Missing Content Warning
rules.hint: Content warnings (CW) are REQUIRED for NSFW content, political discussion and debate, religious promotion and debate, and drug mentions. Please review https://pawb.social/post/101 for more information.

rules.text: Rule #5.2 ‚Äì Sensitive Content in Content Warning Message
rules.hint: Don't put polarizing, graphic, or sensitive content in the content warning (CW) description.

rules.text: Rule #6 ‚Äì No Spam or Advertising
rules.hint: Spam and advertising is not acceptable, but friendly automated bots are welcome. Where possible, try to restrict any recurring automated posts to Unlisted to avoid cluttering the Local and Federated timeline. Content posted by small businesses is NOT considered advertising for the purposes of this rule.

rules.text: Rule #7 ‚Äì Disengage and Report Abuse
rules.hint:
If a user or instance is breaking the rules, we recommend just reporting the content and not engaging. We don‚Äôt want users to end up getting caught in the crossfire for attempting to correct a user in good faith, as this makes our jobs significantly harder.

Additionally, the team is here to help ‚Äì If you‚Äôre unsure on a particular post, user profile, instance, etc. and don‚Äôt think we‚Äôve seen or dealt with it yet, please send in a report. No user will ever be penalized for genuine use of the report system.

rules.text: Rule #8.1 ‚Äì Account / Post Language Missing
rules.hint: We require that all posts are properly marked with the language used, which can be done at the account level through the account preferences page, or per-post by clicking the language button next to ‚ÄúCW‚Äù (Content Warning).

rules.text: Rule #8.2 ‚Äì Account Impersonation
rules.hint: You may not impersonate an individual, group, or organization with the intent to deceive, confuse, and exploit other users. Parody accounts should tag themselves clearly in their profile description.

rules.text: Rule #8.3 ‚Äì Unmarked Bot Account
rules.hint: Bot accounts must mark themselves as a bot and must post using ‚ÄúUnlisted‚Äù, ‚ÄúFollowers only‚Äù, or ‚ÄúMentioned people only‚Äù, so we can keep the local and federated timelines clear and focused on users.

rules.text: Rule #8.4 ‚Äì Unauthorized Brand / Government Accounts
rules.hint: No brand or government-affiliated account may be registered on Pawb.Social services without prior written and publicly recorded approval, except furry fandom-operated brands and events covered by the exception in our full rules. This rule ONLY applies to accounts on Pawb.Social services.

rules.text: Rule #8.5 ‚Äì Bypassing Suspension
rules.hint: If you have been suspended from any Pawb.Social instance, you may not create another account on any of our services.

rules.text: Rule #8.6 ‚Äì Prohibited Avatar / Header Image
rules.hint: All avatars and header images must not contain any content that is prohibited by any other rule in the Code of Conduct, especially content that requires a Content Warning (CW).

rules.text: Full Code of Conduct
rules.hint: The full Code of Conduct can be found at https://docs.google.com/document/d/1jXkulJKMWEmv-cb_jaYkG2L0sTcZeHKdcqwImNkf6Ko ‚Äì Some rules and wording listed here have been summarized for brevity.

title: Gaygeek Social
short_description: This server is intended as a safe place for LGBTQIA+ individuals to socialize. You do not have to be LGBTQIA to join, so long as you are an ally.

rules.text:
Don't post anything which would violate the law in either your home jurisdiction, under US law, or Washington State law.

Any solicitation of, links to, or media containing child sexual abuse material, real or illustrated, is zero tolerance under these legal jurisdictions and you WILL be reported.
Don't be a jerk. Hate speech, discrimination, and harassment of any kind are not tolerated here.
If you post adult content, mark it as sensitive so that your followers can choose when to see it. This includes thirst traps even if they do not depict anything explicitly sexual.
No spam. This includes using completely unrelated hashtags in your posts.
Do not register trademarked usernames unless you are authorized to use that name (Subject to verification and the moderators make the final call)
No advertising or link farming accounts. Commercial accounts are acceptable only if they are also used for customer engagement.
rules.hint: Mastodon is for conversation, not advertisements.  If the majority of your posts link to products or services elsewhere and you do not participate in conversation, or you have no posts and just have profile headers that link to your business, your account is subject to suspension under this rule.

title: Famichiki
short_description: We are a community-driven server operated by a diverse group of foreigners residing in Japan. While we primarily have English speakers in our community, we welcome users of all languages.
description: Welcome to the Famichiki Mastodon. A server ran by foreigners in Japan. Anyone is welcome to sign up, but our target audience are foreigners who want to live, live, or have lived in Japan, and Japanese who want to interact with the foreign community in the country we have chosen to call our home. For a more real time experience, why not check out our Discord? Want to know more about this server? We have a Wordpress Blog where we regularly post updates and where you can learn more about this instance! We're currently having issues delivering mail to outlook.com, live.com, hotmail.com, and other Microsoft owned domains. Please use an alternative provider when signing up, or ping us on Discord to get your account manually approved.

contact_account.note: This is the famichiki.jp administrators and moderators account. It will be used periodically for important information announcements. Please follow if you're interested.

rules.text: Be considerate. No discrimination based on race, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, nationality, or any other characteristic.
No trolling. Do not engage in non-constructive behavior designed to upset members of the community.
Sexually explicit content must be behind a CW, and your bio (profile picture, banner etc) must be completely safe.
No inciting violence or promoting violent ideologies.
Don‚Äôt go overboard with media uploads. Treating Famichiki as free personal file storage is inappropriate and disrespectful to our contributors.
No big corporate advertising or crypto. However, if you are active in the community and also have a project or small business to share, self-promotion is encouraged.

Bots are allowed, within reason. Spamming the local timeline with repetitive/nearly-identical content is not permitted: either set your bot posts to ‚Äòunlisted‚Äô or try botsin.space instead. Ask us if you‚Äôre unsure!
Don‚Äôt post or use this server for illegal content. We are aware of Japan‚Äôs questionable laws regarding the protection of minors: ‚Äòillegal‚Äô here also covers all CSEM/CSAM.
Not your wank bank. Accounts with zero community interaction that only follow porn accounts will be banned. All accounts following CSAM (including art) will also be banned.

rules.text: You may not harass/bully people, incite violence, and/or post hate speech (e.g. racism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, etc)
rules.hint: This includes other abusive behavior such as cyberbullying, brigading/dogpiling, doxxing, trolling, swatting, sending death threats, abusing #fediblock tag,  etc.

rules.text: Do not post misinformation anything advocating extremist movements
rules.hint: Examples includes Anti-Vaxx, Covid-19 misinformation, 5G conspiracy theories or to extremist movements:  National Socialism, Alt-Right, MAGA,  voicing support for fascist/totalitarian regimes, etc

rules.text: Do not post images associated with hate movements, extremist ideologies or groups
rules.hint: Examples includes Confederate States, National Socalism symbols, Alt-Right, etc.

rules.text: NSFW content must be tagged approprately with content warning applied or marked as sensitive. No posting of underaged sexual-explicit content (real life/CSAM/CSEM and lolicon/shotacon) is allowed. This rule is handled differently for servers on the exception list, see about page.
Properly credit artwork that you didn‚Äôt create and AI content must be tagged. No accounts that solely posts AI.
rules.hint: Use #AIArt for any artwork that is generated from AI so users can properly filter it. Accounts may not solely post AI-generated content.

rules.text: Do not post SPAM, links to scam sites, pirated materials, phishing sites, or websites that break federal laws.
rules.hint: Self promotion is OK, as long the links are safe and does not break the above rules.

rules.text: By using this service, you are expected to follow the laws of the United States of America. Refrain from posting anything that may break federal laws.
No mini-modding. If you see any post break the rules, report the post instead.
Sensitive content (e.g. violence, blood/gore, NSFW, self harm) should be put behind a content warning or mark sensitive.
rules.hint: Note that demanding and/or berating users for not using CW, except from a moderator is not allowed, See https://forums.sakurajima.moe/resources/content-warning-policy.18/ for more information about content warnings.

rules.text: Creator accounts  must be Japanese media/culture related  or inspired. This rule does not apply to non-creators. See about page for full details
You may operate bots, but they must follow our rules and must be Japanese Media related.
rules.hint: Bots should not post more than 4 public posts in an hour or 16 unlisted posts in an hour. No repetitive posts, unless unlisted. Bots cannot use AI chat bots (e.g. ChatGPT).

rules.text: No impersonation accounts are allowed (of any creator or famous people) without proper identification.
rules.hint: Parody accounts may not be created here, RP accounts are however allowed.

rules.text: Not your wank bank. Accounts with zero community interaction without a filled profile  that only follow porn accounts will be banned.
rules.hint: If the account only follows porn accounts without a filled out profile (bio+avatar) and/or interaction in a 48 hour period will be suspended.

rules.text: I am at least 16 years of age or older on the date of registration for the disabled.social instance.
I agree to not discriminate or promote/advocate content that oppresses members of marginalized groups (see rules for examples of groups).
I agree to not threaten, stalk, or dox people.
I agree to not harass others using tactics such as brigading, dogpiling, or any other form of contact with a user who has stated that they do not wish to be contacted.
I agree to not engage in mobbing, name-calling, intentional misgendering, or deadnaming.
I agree to not promote/advocate violent nationalist propaganda, fascism, Nazi symbolism, or promoting the ideology of National Socialism.
I agree to not promote/advocate conspiracy narratives or other reactionary myths supporting or leading to the above-mentioned (and/or similar) behavior.
I agree to not promote/advocate unsubstantiated conspiracy theories related to anti-vaxx and COVID19.
I agree to alt text images, caption videos, and try my best to follow the best practices for screen readers.
I agree to not be spammy (e.g., spamming feeds with giveaways, crypto, etc.)
I agree to not post, promote, or advocate any content that is illegal in the United States.

I agree to not use disabled.social as a way to grow a commercial business, market products, or as a way to profit off of disabled people. EXCEPTION: Disabled people who sell products as part of mutual aid efforts and survival (e.g., Etsy shops, personal businesses, written works like books, etc.)
I agree to use content warnings where appropriate.
I agree to follow the remainder of the rules and adhere to the best practices outlined on the server about page.

Welcome to fandom.ink

Inspired by the Great Tumblr Exodus of 2018, fandom.ink is a small instance designed for fans, fandom, and fandom content creators.

Code of conduct

While fans of all kinds are welcome, please note fandom.ink is a moderated instance and that members are expected to abide by the code of conduct.

Support us

While fandom.ink is a free service, keeping it online costs real world cashmoney. If you have some extra to spare and you'd like to throw it our way to help out, we have a Patreon for just that purpose!

rules.text: All users must be 18 or over.

All users must use tools provided by the platform (e.g. blocking, muting, reporting) to curate their own experience. Users must not expect other users to do this work for them (e.g. via "DNIs", etc.).
Behaviors considered illegal, harassing, inappropriate, derogatory or harmful to marginalized persons, or otherwise against the Terms of Service or Code of Conduct, are never tolerated.
Bots must be marked as such, and must not make posts to public timelines more frequently than once per hour.
Accounts auto-crossposted from Twitter or other services may be suspended or limited, without warning, at the administrator's sole discretion.
Adult and erotic content must only be posted in conformance to the "Adult and erotic content" section of the Code of Conduct.
Inactive accounts (i.e. those that have not been accessed for a period of six months or more) may be deleted, without warning, at the administrator's sole discretion.

Be courteous to others. Posting obvious flame-bait to public timelines (e.g. shipwars, nuclear-level takes on the discourse du jour, etc.) may result in content or your account being limited or removed, without warning, at the administrator's sole discretion.
Users caught encouraging or teaching others to circumvent instance rules, the code of conduct, or the terms of service will be penalized as if they themselves had performed the violation in question.
The reposting of unmodified content from the users of other platforms (e.g. cross-posted retweets, reposted art, etc.) is prohibited. Please link to the original content, instead!

rules.text: Don't break the law, respect international laws and the Dutch and Finnish law (where this instance is located).
Be respectful. Don't insult, don't harass. Behave.

short_description: Fediverse community for musicians of all levels, instruments, regions, languages, and genres.
description:
This is a place for musicians to interact, but you can bring your whole self.

You don't have to be a professional musician to join, but you should at least play an instrument or sing as a hobby.

Sharing your own music is strongly encouraged, even (especially!) if it's not polished. Recommending other people's music is allowed, but be clear that you're not sharing your own work. Basically, you must follow copyright law and avoid plagiarism of any kind.

rules.text: PLEASE READ: This server is intended to improve communication within the high performance computing community and related fields. Commercial use for non-related purposes, spam, harassment, or other abuse are prohibited. **Accounts violating these conditions will be removed.**

Please use hashtags such as #HPC to increase discoverability outside of this server. Using #CamelCase in your hashtag makes it more useful to those who use screen readers, and be sure to add alt text to any media.
Be respectful and aware that abusive or illegal behavior or other violations of server rules will lead to suspension of access.
