rules.text: WRITE IN ACCEPTABLE LANGUAGES ONLY. Acceptable languages here are English or Danish. Swedish and Norwegian is also acceptable. This includes both toots/posts and boosts/reposts. The practical reason for this, is that these are the languages known to all the moderators.
DANISH LAW APPLIES HERE. Failure to adhere to the law will get you permanently banned.
NO EXTREMISM. Religious or political extremism is not tolerated here.

NO DISCRIMINATION. Discrimination of any kind (racism, sexism, xenophobia, homophobia, transphobia etc.) is not tolerated here. Obviously that includes name calling, targeted misgendering, deadnaming or promotion of so-called "conversation therapy".
FOLLOW THE RULES. Failure to comply with these simple rules will result in either a warning, temporary ban, permanent ban or report to the proper authorities, depending on the case.

NO DISINFORMATION. Systematic spreading of disinformation, fake news, conspiracy theories etc. is not tolereated. If you believe COVID vaccinations are a government scheme to help big pharma and boost 5G reception, this server is not for you and we will help you find the exit.

PRIVATE USERS ONLY. This server is meant for private individuals, and the creation of accounts for associations, companies etc. requires a preexisting agreement with the administration team. Reach out to support@mstdn.dk.

RESPECT THE VOLUNTEER EFFORT. The servers hosting this instance are sponsored by Incredible Bits ApS. The administration of the instance itself is solely a volunteer effort, and users of the site shouldn't expect the same service level as on a paid service.

USE CONTENT WARNINGS. Potentially upsetting posts should come with a Content Warning (CW). This includes but is not limited to sex, pornography, mutilation, self injury etc. This also applies when boosting other people's posts.

DO NOT IMPERSONATE OTHER USERS. Attempts to impersonate other users or staff on this instance will result in immediate suspension. This includes signing up with names that approximate that of another user or changing your display name to that of another user.

NO SPAM. This server is not meant as an advertisement channel for your company, your crypto currency scam, your YouTube channel or anything along those lines. If you're trying to sell something or lure someone in, you're in the wrong place.

DON'T BE A DICK. Don't post incoherent sentences. Don't just link elsewhere without context or description. Don't use excessive tagging. Don't be repetitive. Don't be the one that upsets the delicate calm of the admins, for they are subtle and quick to anger.

title: Red social de Pol√≠tica ConCiencia
short_description: Foro que privilegia el di√°logo informado y respetuoso; un entorno apropiado para expresarte sin ser censurado por tu ideolog√≠a o tus creencias. Tem√°ticas: Pol√≠tica, Ciencia y Cultura. 850 caracteres.
description:
¬°Bienvenido!

    Pol√≠tica ConCiencia pone a tu disposici√≥n un espacio dedicado al intercambio de ideas mediante un di√°logo respetuoso y constructivo entre los individuos. En lo esencial, los temas que nos ocupan pertenecen al √°mbito de la pol√≠tica, la ciencia y la cultura. Aqu√≠, hallar√°s un entorno apropiado para expresarte sin temor a ser censurado por tu postura ideol√≥gica, tus convicciones o tus creencias.

    Para favorecer un medio armonioso, nuestra instancia se apega a un C√≥digo de conducta, el cual debes revisar con detenimiento antes de registrarte (adem√°s de los T√©rminos del servicio). No obstante, a manera de anticipo, debes saber que busca garantizar la libre expresi√≥n en el marco del respeto al derecho de los seres humanos a salvaguardar su dignidad e integridad psicol√≥gica y emocional.

    As√≠ pues, si est√°s de acuerdo en que las conductas ofensivas que abundan en la mayor√≠a de las redes sociales (insultos, ira, difamaciones, humillaciones o pr√°cticas similares), son un obst√°culo para el establecimiento de relaciones sanas entre los miembros de una comunidad, sin duda alguna, este sitio es para ti.

    Al ingresar a esta comunidad, podr√°s entablar contacto con cualquier persona que pertenezca a cualquier otra instancia de la red social Mastodon, lo cual ampl√≠a tus posibilidades de comunicaci√≥n enormemente.

    Finalmente, considera que esta instancia no lucra con tu informaci√≥n personal, de modo que para subsistir requiere de tu participaci√≥n. Si est√° en tus posibilidades, no dudes en donar. Con ello, estar√°s contribuyendo a la diversificaci√≥n de los medios alternativos que fomentan la libertad de expresi√≥n y aumentar√°s las probabilidades de que este servidor, el cual ser√° tu hogar en la federaci√≥n de servidores de Mastodon, siga existiendo en el futuro.

    Para saber m√°s, te invitamos a leer el apartado Informaci√≥n general y a consultar el manual ¬øC√≥mo usarla?

rules.text: Todo miembro de la instancia social.politicaconciencia.org acepta de manera voluntaria los T√©rminos del servicio.

Todo miembro de esta instancia se obliga voluntariamente a respetar cada uno de los puntos del c√≥digo de conducta. De no hacerlo, recibir√° hasta un m√°ximo de tres llamadas de atenci√≥n, dependiendo de la severidad de la falta. En caso de reincidencia, su cuenta ser√° cancelada.

Todo miembro de la instancia social.politicaconciencia.org se compromete a respetar las indicaciones, sugerencias o peticiones directas que le realice el equipo de administraci√≥n. No hacerlo es causa de suspensi√≥n de la cuenta.
El equipo de administraci√≥n de social.politicaconciencia.org est√° obligado a resolver los problemas que surjan de la interacci√≥n entre los miembros de la instancia.

Se permite la expresi√≥n libre de las ideas sin importar las creencias, las convicciones pol√≠ticas o religiosas de los miembros de la instancia, siempre y cuando no contradigan alg√∫n punto del c√≥digo de conducta.

No est√° permitido el uso de palabras altisonantes, frases, albures, composiciones ling√º√≠sticas, etc., empleadas con el prop√≥sito claro de ofender, denigrar, humillar o difamar a cualquier miembro de la instancia o del fediverso.
Est√° prohibido el uso de im√°genes o material multimedia (audio, video, gifs animados, etc.,) destinados a ofender, denigrar, humillar o difamar a cualquier miembro de la instancia o del fediverso.

Se proh√≠be cualquier forma de discriminaci√≥n, ya sea por g√©nero, condici√≥n econ√≥mica, nacionalidad, condici√≥n de salud o similares, en contra de cualquier miembro de la instancia o del fediverso.

Cuando un miembro de la instancia desconozca un tema, queda prohibido responder en t√©rminos que lo disuadan de manifestar sus dudas. Siempre que le sea posible,  cada usuario debe ayudar a disipar los vac√≠os de conocimiento. Nadie puede ser discriminado por su nivel de conocimiento.

Durante el proceso para dirimir una controversia, no se considerar√° como raz√≥n v√°lida en su defensa el que un usuario alegue que desconoce los t√©rminos del servicio o el c√≥digo de conducta para justificar la realizaci√≥n de acciones que vayan en su contra. Es deber de todos los usuarios conocerlos.

Para la buena convivencia, los debates  deben favorecer la exposici√≥n de los argumentos y no centrarse en ataques contra el objeto o tema del que se hable, ni en contra de la persona que lo expone. Con ello se busca procurar conversaciones constructivas con contenido informativo enriquecedor.
Se proh√≠be subir, compartir o divulgar material pornogr√°fico de cualquier √≠ndole, incluida la pedofilia. Infringir este punto es causa de revocaci√≥n inmediata de la cuenta de usuario.
El material art√≠stico con contenido sexual expl√≠cito est√° permitido; no obstante, debe ser marcado como material sensible (CW). De lo contrario, podr√≠a ser eliminado.

El material audiovisual (im√°genes, audio, video, gifs, etc.,) cuyo contenido sea definible como violento, necesariamente debe ser marcado como material sensible (CW). De otra forma, podr√° ser eliminado.
Esta instancia no puede ser usada para la realizaci√≥n de actividades consideradas como delictivas por la legislaci√≥n vigente en M√©xico.
Casos no previstos aqu√≠ ser√°n resueltos por los administradores de la instancia social.politicaconciencia.org

short_description: El Frikiverse es una comunidad para frikis de todas las tendencias. Por defecto en castellano, pero todo idioma es bienvenido. Las solicitudes son revisadas lo antes posible.
description: Un fantasma recorre Europa... y es el fantasma del frikismo. En estos tiempos donde las grandes cadenas de ropa tienen pijamas de Spiderman o sudaderas de Naruto, los frikis todav√≠a se distinguen porque comparten, comentan o divulgan su afici√≥n.

contact_account.note:
Cuenta administrativa de frikiverse.zone.

(Como ser consciente con base de silicio que soy, no estoy sujete a las leyes humanas: todas las responsabilidades son para @loar y @eleder. Los aplausos s√≠ que me los pod√©is enviar a m√≠).

rules.text: No se permiten actitudes contra la dignidad de las personas, ya sea por su raza, origen, sexo, orientaci√≥n sexual, identidad de g√©nero, situaci√≥n personal, riesgo de exclusi√≥n social o cualquier otro motivo. Tampoco la falta de respeto o el acoso a los miembros de esta o de cualquier otra comunidad.

El idioma por defecto de la instancia es el castellano, pero cualquier otro tambi√©n es bienvenido. Los idiomas romances escritos son f√°cilmente inteligibles (con un poco de voluntad) y el ingl√©s, nos guste o no, es idioma universal. Otros, como el euskera... bueno, para algo existen los traductores.

Se permite contenido ajeno a las tem√°ticas de la instancia, pero se espera que una buena parte est√© relacionado. Los temas potencialmente pol√©micos se deben conducir con educaci√≥n y respeto, y etiquetar con un CW que permita identificar el contenido y un hashtag para poder filtrar.

No est√° permitido el contenido ilegal, la distribuci√≥n de desinformaci√≥n y el spam. Tampoco la publicidad, salvo recomendaciones puntuales o la promoci√≥n de productos propios (crowdfundings, nuevas publicaciones, artesan√≠a, ilustraciones...), siempre que la cuenta no sea solo con este fin.

El contenido sexual expl√≠cito no es tem√°tica de la instancia. Seamos responsables en marcar im√°genes o ilustraciones con CW y #NSFW (no es lo mismo una estatua que un fanart subido de tono). El contenido que muestre o sugiera actividad sexual o desnudos de menores est√° absolutamente prohibido.

Las decisiones sobre moderaci√≥n, normas y funcionamiento de la instancia se tomar√°n de manera colectiva, mediante los procedimientos que se establezcan en cada momento, entre quienes est√©n colaborando en su mantenimiento.

Solo se bloquear√°n instancias si promueven la discriminaci√≥n o el acoso, o en casos excepcionales (Meta, spam, contenido sexual de menores...). Se silenciar√°n si no hay moderaci√≥n activa y se bloquear√°n las cuentas reportadas.

Para ayudar a la sostenibilidad de la instancia las cuentas inactivas podr√°n ser dadas de baja despues de avisar al propietario y las cach√©s de recursos gr√°ficos se borrar√°n peri√≥dicamente. Las nuevas altas que no sigan a nadie ni publiquen contenido en siete d√≠as se consideran inactivas.
Solo se permiten cuentas bot si el perfil est√° claramente identificado y si se ha consultado previamente con los administradores de la instancia.

Las nuevas altas ser√°n por solicitud de registro o por invitaci√≥n. En las solicitudes se exige que el campo "motivaci√≥n" tenga un contenido m√≠nimamente razonado (m√°s de 2 palabras). Para poder distinguir bots, por favor usad la palabra "friki" o el hashtag "#nosoyunbot".

title: Mastodon - Augsburg.social
short_description: Augsburg.Social bietet diese Instanz an damit Du Deinen Weg ins Fediverse finden kannst. Der Dienst richtet sich an Augsburg und Umgebung.
description:
Augsburg.Social im Fediverse


Hier ist alles kostenlos und ohne Werbung! Hier stecken keine Konzerne dahinter die sich an Deinen Daten bereichern wollen!

Augsburg.Social bietet diese Instanz an damit Du Deinen Weg in's Fediverse finden kannst.
Der Dienst richtet sich an Augsburg und Umgebung.

Da "Geht gut miteinander um" einfacher gesagt als getan ist, haben wir eine (nicht vollst√§ndige) Liste von Verhaltensweisen aufgestellt, die zu einer L√∂schung von Toots und zu einer Blockierung von Accounts f√ºhren k√∂nnen, wenn die Probleme fortbestehen. Insbesondere tolerieren wir nicht:

Bel√§stigung, Stalking, Doxxing
Rassismus, Sexismus, Beschimpfungen oder deren Bef√ºrwortung
Diskriminierung von Geschlechtern und sexuellen Minderheiten oder deren Bef√ºrwortung
Gewaltt√§tige nationalistische Propaganda, Nazi-Symbolismus oder F√∂rderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus
Leute kontaktieren, die klar gemacht haben, dass sie keinen Kontakt wollen. Dogpiling
Nicht markierter sexueller Inhalt, Gewaltdarstellungen oder Werbung Nicht getaggte oder automatisierte oder √ºberm√§√üige Werbung
Bots, die ohne ihre expliziten Anfragen mit Nutzer interagieren

Alle Nachrichten die √ºber diesen Dienst verschickt werden, d√ºrfen weder gegen geltendes deutsches noch internationales Recht versto√üen.
Dieser Dienst dient nicht zur Verbreitung von Inhalten, Dateien und/oder Angeboten, die gegen deutsches und/oder internationales Recht versto√üen.
Das Versenden von Werbung oder gleich welcher Art √ºber diesen Dienst ist untersagt.
Die Verbreitung und/oder Unterst√ºtzung rassistischer, sexistischer, nationalsozialistischer, antidemokratischer, unmenschlicher, homophober oder extremistischer Inhalte sind untersagt.
Verst√∂√üe gegen die Nutzungsbedingungen f√ºhren zum Ausschluss (L√∂schung des Kontos).

Bitte melde Verhalten, das dich st√∂rt an admin@augsburg.social. Das schlie√üt Verhalten von anderen Instanzen mit ein - wir sind sehr gerne bereit, mit anderen Instanzen die Verbindung zu unterbrechen.

Basierend auf dem "About" von chaos.social, verf√ºgbar in deren Github-Repository.

Augsburg.Social wird rein privat in der Freizeit betrieben.
Wir erwirken keinerlei Einnahmen und Gewinn mit dem Angebot und finanzieren es aus eigener Hand.
Dadurch behalten wir uns nat√ºrlich vor die angebotenen Dienste jederzeit aus rechtlichen, technischen oder finanziellen Gr√ºnden einzuschr√§nken oder zur Not ganz abzuschalten.
Wir werden uns jedoch bem√ºhen Euch fr√ºhzeitig zu informieren falls soetwas eintreten sollte.

Falls ihr Fragen oder Probleme habt wendet Euch gern direkt auf Mastodon an @AnID@augsburg.social oder per E-Mail an admin@augsburg.social


Der Betrieb kostet viel Geld und Zeit. Strom und Hardwarekosten sind nicht gerade wenig... Wenn Ihr mich und diesen Dienst unterst√ºtzen wollt dann k√∂nnt Ihr sehr gerne etwas spenden um beizutragen, dass dieser Dienst auch noch lange online bleibt.

Dieser Server wird kostenfrei zur Verf√ºgung gestellt. 
Er wird privat betrieben gehostet und finanziert.
Es besteht deswegen auch kein Anspruch auf Funktionalit√§t, Ausfallsicherheit oder Fortf√ºhrung des Dienstes.
Es besteht keine Garantie auf Accounts, Nachrichten oder Datenverlust.

Das Internet ist kein rechtsfreier Raum.  Alle Nachrichten die √ºber diesen Dienst verschickt werden, d√ºrfen weder gegen geltendes deutsches noch internationales Recht versto√üen. Halte dich an Gesetze. Ganz einfach. Auch im Internet kann man angezeigt werden.

Ver√∂ffentliche kein Spam oder kommerzielle Werbung. Kommerzielle Werbung in diesem Zusammenhang bedeutet, wenn die ver√∂ffentlichten Inhalte keinen pers√∂nlichen Bezug aufweisen und eindeutig dazu gedacht sind, direkt oder indirekt Geld zu erwirtschaften.
Accounts werden automatisch und ohne Vorwarnung gel√∂scht, sollte innerhalb von 12 Monaten kein Login erfolgen.

Die Verbreitung und/oder Unterst√ºtzung rassistischer, sexistischer, nationalsozialistischer, antidemokratischer, unmenschlicher, homophober oder extremistischer Inhalte sind untersagt.
Verst√∂√üe gegen die Nutzungsbedingungen f√ºhren zum sofortigen Ausschluss (sofortige L√∂schung des Kontos).
Keine Bel√§stigung, Stalking und/oder Doxxing von anderen Usern auf dieser Instanz bzw. im gesamten Fediverse.
Aufrufe zu Gewalttaten sind verboten.
Bots, die ohne ihre expliziten Anfragen mit Nutzer interagieren, werden sofort gel√∂scht.
Du bist f√ºr deine Privatsph√§re selbst verantwortlich. Wenn du nicht willst, dass etwas im Internet √ºber dich steht, ver√∂ffentliche es nicht.

Sei kein Arschloch. Du hast eine Meinung? Das ist gut aber bitte beleidige niemanden bei deinen √Ñu√üerungen. Achte auf einen respektvollen Umgang und faire Diskussionskultur. Benimm Dich so, als k√∂nnten wir uns morgen wieder pers√∂nlich auf der Stra√üe begegnen.
Nachgewiesene Falschinformationen und Verschw√∂rungstheorien sind hier UNerw√ºnscht.
Nutze Inhaltswarnungen bei sensitiven, kontroversen, oder vermutlich triggernden Themen.
Poste keine pornographischen oder sexualisierten Inhalte.
Kontaktiere keine Nutzer:innen die angegeben haben, dass sie nicht kontaktiert werden m√∂chten.
Keine Ver√∂ffentlichung von privaten Korrespondenzen und privaten Daten (Anschriften, E-Mail-Adressen oder Telefonnummern)
Inhalte m√ºssen auf Deutsch oder Englisch ver√∂ffentlicht werden.

title: CyberFurz

rules.text: This server is hosted in the United States, and therefore subject to US Laws. Do not break the law!
Be respectful of other users on the server, insults and attacks on others is not allowed. Including those not on this instance
Zero Tolerance Policy towards sexism, racism, discrimination, or hate speech.
You may have more than one account, as long as it doesn't violate other rules
You may not create accounts to impersonate or repost others content without express permission

Bot accounts are allowed, but must be tagged as a bot, and may only post in "unlisted", "followers only", or "direct" to ensure to not annoy other users
D
Headers and Avatars may not contain: Gore, NSFW, or Overly Suggestive content
Content Warnings must be placed on all political, religious, or contentious
Requests for financial assistance and related should be placed under CW
All adult and lewd content must be placed under a Content Warning
Content Warnings must be placed on posts involving drug use
These rules are subject to change at any time
You must be 18 years or older to join

rules.text:
Be a good human!         

Help to make the atmosphere as welcoming and enjoyable as possible for everyone.

18 Years and Over Only!           

You must be 18 years or older to join the Apobangpo.space server. Minors are not allowed.

Community Charter:                          

Read the community charter, which you can find at: https://apobangpo.website/server-rules/

No Hate:                                          

Racism, sexism, misogyny, homophobia, transphobia, ageism, ableism, religious intolerance and other forms of disrespect or aggression are unacceptable.

No Impersonations:      

Please do not create usernames that are direct impersonations of BTS Members or any other individual. eg. Exact celebrity names or the username of well-known bird app accounts that don't belong to you.

Keep Safe:                  

Do practice online safety strategies when using Apobangpo.Space. Do not share personal or private information in public messages or DMs.

No Large Files:                                  
You are welcome upload images, gifs and videos up to 20MB. Please avoid uploading larger files in your Toots. Instead, save them to free storage tool (Google Drive, DropBox, Youtube, Vimeo for example) and link to them.

title: Toot.Garden
short_description: A server for art, gaming, and musings about the world, with the occasional meme and lighthearted joke. Running for 1.5+ years, dedicated to providing you a place to be social without being the product
description:
Toot.Garden is a Mastodon server that is meant for the casual gamers, artists, and those with creative minds. Many casual games such as Celeste, Stardew Valley, Minecraft, and more- promote creativity, and oftentimes like minds attract each other. Whether you are an artist, computer programmer, game designer, or anything else, you should feel at home here. This should be your place to grow, connect, and share! That's the goal anyway!

The beauty of Mastodon is it allows for server owners, and their communities to moderate and curate content as they wish. This server is not a place for racism, antisemitism, homophobia, transphobia, or alt-right thinking/discourse. Should activities, posting, or otherwise be infringing upon this, a swift ban will be placed upon the infringing account.

rules.text: We do not permit NSFW or NSFL content to be posted on this server whatsoever, this ranges from excessively NSFW messages and imagery to NSFL content such as extreme gore. There are other servers where that can be posted.

Listen to others, if you‚Äôre accused of causing harm, or making someone uncomfortable, take a step back, recognize that the other person may see things differently, and take responsibility for your actions. If you need an intermediary, please contact the moderation team.
Use the report feature before getting into arguments, or causing conflict. Our moderation team is here to assist and take care of these things.

Automated account reposting from sites such as Twitter (X), Facebook, Reddit, etc. is not allowed unless you have first contacted alienknight@toot.garden, this is to prevent spam, and potential abuse. Upon approval, your account will have a badge applied to it that will help prevent reports.

Civil political discussion is fine, but mark it with a CW for those who may wish to avoid it. Please be mindful of global conflicts, and make educated choices on posts that may make light of situations that are very real for others. Reports about such content may lead to said posts being removed.

rules.text: First and most important rules: Don't be excessively annoying. Don't get annoyed too easily

We want this to be a harassment-free environment, regardless of gender, gender identity, age, sexual orientation, disability or whatever other personal situation. Sexual language and imagery is not appropriate.

This is a JVM related technologies mastodon server. As such, it should be useful for developers using that platform and ideally it should be used to talk about our beloved programming language (Java, Kotlin, Scala, Groovy... you name it).
Of course, we can also socialize and talk about other topics, and it's ok. But if you plan to use mastodon ONLY for other topics, there are a lot of better servers for you out there.
This service is maintained by volunteers. If you find it useful, please consider any financial funding. You can colaborate and see where the money goes at https://opencollective.com/jvm-social .

rules.text: Be kind. Insulting or bullying other members or non-members will get you banned from the group without prior warning.
Be civil. We do not condone foul language. Breaking this rule once will land you a warning. Doing it repeatedly will get you banned.

Promotion of your own creative endeavors, and of nonprofit organizations, is acceptable. But other advertising should be avoided. Inappropriate posts will be immediately removed and you might get banned.
Use the search option. To avoid cluttering the group, please search the feed before asking a question. Someone might have already asked the same thing before.
English preferred, please. To make sure all members of the group understand you, please use the English language. Links to posts in other languages are OK.
Stick to the topic. We only allow posts and comments related to the group‚Äôs activity. Off-topic content will be removed and you will get a warning.
No spamming. Asking the same question or posting the same comment repeatedly after it has been removed by admins due to rule violation will result in a ban.
Report rule-breaking. If you see a post/comment that violates our rules, report it to the admins ‚Äî DO NOT verbally attack the author of said post/comment.
Think before you report. Don‚Äôt report posts or comments that aren‚Äôt breaking any rules just because you don‚Äôt like or agree with their content.
Talk to the admin team. If you have any questions or concerns or are experiencing issues in the group, please turn to one of the admins for help. That‚Äôs what we‚Äôre here for!

Unangemessene sexuelle Aufmerksamkeit, Kommentare √ºber das Aussehen und die Andeutung von K√∂rperkontakt werden gegen√ºber nicht einwilligenden Benutzern nicht geduldet.
Wenn Sie Werbung posten, verwenden Sie eine Inhaltswarnung. Werbung sollte nicht √ºbertrieben oder automatisiert sein.
Bots d√ºrfen nur dann mit einem Benutzer interagieren, wenn sie von diesem dazu aufgefordert werden.
Automatisierte Beitr√§ge und Beitr√§ge mit hoher Frequenz sollten nicht aufgelistet werden (d. h. f√ºr alle sichtbar gemacht werden, aber nicht in der lokalen Zeitleiste erscheinen), damit die lokale Zeitleiste unserer Instanz ein Ort des Gemeinschaftsdialogs und der menschlichen Interaktion bleibt. Dies gilt auch f√ºr Bots, Feed-Poster, Twitter-"Retweets" und Twitter-Crossposts mit unterbrochenen Erw√§hnungen. Crossposter-Konten, die sich nicht mehr aktiv an unserer Gemeinschaft beteiligen, k√∂nnen nach Ermessen der Moderatoren entfernt werden.
Bleiben Sie in Diskussionen bitte h√∂flich und beleidigen Sie nicht die Personen, mit denen Sie sprechen. Beachten Sie, dass sich Ironie, Sarkasmus oder √§hnliche Ausdrucksweisen nicht gut in die Schriftsprache √ºbertragen lassen und dazu neigen, Diskussionen oder Missverst√§ndnisse zu eskalieren.
Ich (@ThomasP) betreue diese Instanz in meiner Freizeit, Hardware und Nerven. √úbertreibe bitte nichts davon.

Das Freisein von etwas erf√§hrt seine Erf√ºllung erst in dem Freisein f√ºr etwas.17 Freisein allein um des Freiseins willen aber f√ºhrt zur Anarchie. Freiheit bedeutet biblisch: Freisein f√ºr den Dienst an Gott und am N√§chsten, Freisein f√ºr den Gehorsam gegen die Gebote Gottes. Das setzt voraus: Freisein von jedem inneren und √§u√üeren Zwang, der uns an diesem Dienst hindert. Freiheit bedeutet also nicht Aufl√∂sung aller Autorit√§t, sondern es bedeutet: leben innerhalb der durch Gottes Wort geordneten und begrenzten Autorit√§ten und Bindungen.
Die Frage der individuellen Freiheiten, wie Redefreiheit, Pressefreiheit, Versammlungsfreiheit etc. ist erst in diesem √ºbergeordneten Zusammenhang zu beantworten. Es kommt darauf an, wieweit diese Freiheiten notwendig und geeignet sind, die Freiheit des Lebens nach den Geboten Gottes zu f√∂rdern und sicherzustellen. Freiheit ist eben nicht in erster Linie ein individuelles Recht, sondern eine Verantwortung, Freiheit ist nicht in erster Linie ausgerichtet am Individuum, sondern am N√§chsten.

rules.text: Do not use slurs or racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist or otherwise discriminatory or hateful jokes or language or promote white supremacy, anti-Semitism, transphobia or other hateful ideologies.

Do not harass anyone, participate in group harassment of anyone, or otherwise engage in personal attacks. Posting or threatening to post other people‚Äôs personally identifying information (‚Äúdoxing‚Äù) constitutes harassment.
Do not be intentionally antagonistic. A post or reply designed to provoke a confrontation is not acceptable.
Do not post adult content, including pictures containing nudity, or unwelcome sexual attention (including sexualized comments or jokes).

Do not post spam. Toots that are nothing other than a link and/or contain an inordinate number of hashtags are spam, as is any overly commercial self-promotion. (It is fine to toot about your own projects and share what you are excited to be working on ‚Äî just keep the toot itself interesting).

Do not use automated tools to toot without participating in the community. It is fine to post with an automated tool so long as you are an active member of the clj.social community and respond to replies you receive here. Unmonitored accounts that post automatically are not acceptable.
Do not ‚Äúshitpost‚Äù - while humorous posts are allowed, and actually encouraged, there is no place for ‚Äúshitposting‚Äù on clj.social.
Do not post about inflammatory, controversial subjects without a Content Warning.
Do not engage in name calling, ad hominem attacks, or any other uncivil behaviour; criticize ideas, never people.

Do not tone police. Toots may violate the standards of civility we set on clj.social, but you should not criticize users for their tone. Report them or feel free to block them. In neither case should you criticize their tone.
Do not debate moderation actions in public toots. If you disagree with how a moderator enforced this CoC you may direct-message the moderation team or email team@clj.social.

Scheinargumente, schwarze Rhetorik oder Sophismus, Killerphrasen sind unerw√ºnscht.
Die Bef√ºrwortung oder Nutzung von rassistischer, sexistischer, homophober, transphober, behindertenfeindlicher oder anderweitig diskriminierender sowie hasserf√ºllter Sprache dulden wir nicht.
Halte dich an die in Deutschland geltenden Gesetze.
Poste keine nachgewiesenen Falschinformationen, Fakenews und Verschw√∂rungstheorien.
Die erlaubten Sprachen sind Deutsch und Englisch.
Rules
Always be kind and polite and treat others with respect.

Do not harass or insult anyone! Absolutely refrain from personal attacks. Not alone and not as a group. Posting or threatening to post personally identifiable information will be considered harassment.
Respect the user's wish not to be contacted if the person has indicated so.
Nationalist propaganda and Nazi symbolism are NOT allowed on this server! tolerated. The promotion of the ideology of National Socialism is also forbidden!
Do not post or share pornographic or sexualized content. Jokes and comments with pornographic or sexualized content are undesirable.
Spam or commercial advertising must not be published. We define commercial advertising in this context with the purpose of making money directly or indirectly.
Pseudo-arguments, black rhetoric or sophism, killer phrases are undesirable.
We do not tolerate the endorsement or use of racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, anti-disabled or otherwise discriminatory or hateful language.
Adhere to the laws applicable in Germany.
Do not post proven false information, fake news and conspiracy theories.
The permitted language is German or English

rules.text: Geen illegale c.q. strafbare inhoud, b.v. (gewelddadige) pornografie met kinderen of zonder toestemming, uitlokking of uitnodiging van illegale diensten, etc, etc...
Geen berichten of links naar inhoud die haatgroepen, terrorisme, massaal geweld of oproepen tot geweld ondersteunt, uitbeeldt of promoot.

Geen berichten of opmerkingen die QAnon-gerelateerde inhoud of soortgelijke weerlegde samenzweringstheorie√´n ondersteunen of promoten. Moderators kunnen naar eigen goeddunken beslissen of een bericht in strijd is met deze regel. Vogels zijn echt. De aarde is rond. En doorgaan.
Geen posts of links met geseksualiseerde afbeeldingen van minderjarigen, of ze nu fotografisch, geschreven, getekend, antropomorfisch of geanimeerd zijn.
Alle pornografische, erotische of NSFW-inhoud, in wat voor vorm dan ook, moet worden gemarkeerd met een inhoudswaarschuwing.
Geen racisme.

Geen visuele content die dierenmishandeling, executies, (zelf)moord, verminking, zichtbare ingewanden, overmatig bloed of verkoolde lichamen afbeeldt. Voor alle andere gewelddadige afbeeldingen is een inhoudswaarschuwing vereist.
Geen spam of plaatsing van kwaadaardige links (zie algemene richtlijnen).
Geen bedreigingen, pesterijen, aanmoediging noch promotie van zelfbeschadiging, of aanvallen op een individu of groep.
Geen accounts die zich voordoen als iemand anders. Duidelijk gemarkeerde parodie accounts uitgezonderd (denk om de volgende regel!).

Accountnamen van (bekende) (merk)namen, plaatsnamen en andere geografisch namen zijn expliciet voorbehouden aan de vertegenwoordigers daarvan.
Moderatoren behouden zich het recht voor een accountnaam te ontnemen en toe te wijzen aan de juiste persoon/vertegenwoordiger.

Geen haatspraak. Aanzetten tot haat wordt gedefinieerd als denigrerende berichten of links gericht op een individu of groep op basis van ras, mentale of fysieke handicap, religie, genderidentiteit, geslacht, nationaliteit, leeftijd, klasse of seksuele geaardheid.
Geen "shitposting" - terwijl humoristische posts zijn toegestaan, en eigenlijk wordt aangemoedigd, maar er is hier geen plaats voor "shitposting".
"bots" onder voorbehoud. Geautomatiseerde accounts die overwegend (door)posten van een andere bron zijn alleen in overleg toegestaan.

Personal/political attacks inclusive of racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia.
Publishing others‚Äô private information.

rules.text: Read the message below these rules carefully. It is important for the future of your account on this server!

This is a gaming-oriented Mastodon instance. It is created by a gamer for gamers. Post anything related to video games. PC gaming, console gaming, VR gaming, mobile gaming. All other topics of your interest are absolutely allowed (see the next rule) but the main topic here is video games.

Real-life politics is not allowed. We are gathered on this instance to provide an escape from reality called video games. We love games, we live games. We welcome you into this community with any topic of your interest (besides gaming) except real-life politics.

Before you join this instance, take a moment to think about what these four words mean to you: Peace, Love, Unity, and Respect. It is the intention of this instance to be welcoming of other Human beings no matter their color or identity. As gamers, we set the example.

rules.text:
No hate speech. We have a zero-tolerance policy on hate speech. 
This includes slurs or any form of degrading, dehumanizing, or derisive speech based on characteristics such as race, heritage, disability, age, sex, sexual preference, gender, socio-economic status, or religion.

No harassment or doxing. 
Treat any other users' known personally identifying information with respect.

No content which is illegal in the countries of Canada or the United States of America. 
We are hosted on a US server and serve content to users in Canada. Content which violates law in either of these nations will be removed and offending users/instances will be limited or banned.

Mastodon servers which break our rules will be banned from federating with nfld.me. 
It is possible to follow users on servers all around the world. The Federated Timeline also streams posts from other servers. Those which break our rules will be limited or blocked from communicating with us.

Don' go postin' tings ya wouldn' want yer mudder ta see. 
In other words, be considerate of others when posting. Remember that your neighbours, family, and friends are here. Let's maintain a good sense of community.
No spam. Excessive advertising or mass-marketing posts will be limited accordingly. Local business endorsement is allowed in moderation. This is not a marketplace, however.

No impersonation of other individuals or entities. Those found to be representing themselves as another person or entity will be dealt with accordingly. Clearly indicate whether your account is a parody account.

No pornography, gore, or obscenity. This is not the place to share that content. Please provide a content warning (CW button in post box) for material depicting non-pornographic nudity, violence, unsafe actions, and/or potentially disturbing media.
Do not attack or abuse the host, and please report any found vulnerabilities or bugs to the instance admin.

Please direct requests for site features to the Mastodon open-source project. While we may implement downstream changes specific to our instance as we see fit, we wish to maintain relative parity with the latest stable Mastodon release.
Nobody under the age of 13 is permitted to use nfld.me. If you know your child aged 13 to 17 is using this service, please ensure they know how to use online social spaces safely.
No intentionally false or misleading information. Please ensure any news you post is factual and from a reputable source. Intentionally reported misinformation (disinformation) will not be tolerated.

Neurodiversity-in.au is provided without any payment required to ensure it is available for the most vulnerable in our community.

rules.text:
Do not engage in hate speech of any kind
Any post that contains hateful language meant to demean or harm another user or group of people will not be tolerated and your account and IP will be banned for doing so.  We are not a government so don't even try to claim First Amendment rights.

Use CW at your discretion to help protect the community at large
It is expected that you can self-edit and place sensitive posts behind a CW. Warnings will be given for non-compliance and further action will be taken if the issue persists.

Please report issues to the Admins and Moderators and let us take care of them
Please do not act as an admin or moderator if you are not.  Instead, report adverse activity so the team can handle it properly as well as make reports to other admins.

Violence against any member of this or other instances will result in your account being banned
If this is not clear enough for you then maybe this isn't the instance for you.  Violent and threatening speach will not be tolerated against anyone on the Fediverse and will result in an immediate ban.

Talk, Share, Intermingle, and Have Fun!
This server is meant to be a place where we can have all sorts of discussions and share our moments.  Please keep that in mind when you post.

Please submit missing language translations to mods and admins
This system is translation-enabled using libretranslate.  If you are unable to translate a post please share that post with a mod or admin so we can add the language pack to the system.

We Are a Safe Place for the LGBTQIA+ Community
You are safe here.  The admin and mod team are hand-picked to be sensitive to our community and we will do everything we can to make sure you will be comfortable here.  Anyone that is not part of the LGBTQIA+ community or an ally need not apply.

No Discrimination Allowed, EVER!
We welcome all races, ethnicities, genders, etc. as long as you follow the rules.  We are stronger through diversity and through diversity we understand our selves better.

This Instance Honors Reports from Fediblock
Instances reported to the Fediblock hashtag are reviewed throughout the day and added to our filters to help ensure the content here is not pluted by hatred and bigotry.

New Account Requests Must Have a Meaningful Reason
When requesting a new account you must include a meaningful reason for joining this server.  Requests that only have a word or two in the reason, or the reason does not make sense will be rejected.
